She is requesting a loan to buy two bags of fertilizer, which are needed  so she can apply them to the cornfield, so they strengthen the crop and make it healthy.  This loan will provide the money for her to make the purchase, and she and her husband will apply it to the crop together.

Her dream is to improve her economic conditions, and she looks forward to working with her husband to build their own home someday.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
This is Ruth. She is 58 years old and a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Leandro, a farmer, and she is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Ruth operates a tailoring business. She mainly offers dresses and slacks. She provides for seasonal clothing demands like uniforms all year round. She also does repairs and alterations. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operation of her business, she is requesting a PHP 14,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread and other items needed in her business. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.  

Ruth hopes her business grows and dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. There she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God as she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread and other items needed in her business.

loans.name: Baltazar De Jesus

texts.es:
Baltazar, tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa quien tiene 52 años, posee hijos quienes viven fuera del hogar, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado tiene tres vacas y un ternero, el realizar compras periódicas y ventas del ganado, tiene más de 30 años en esta actividad la que aprendió de su padre.

El solicita un préstamo para poderlo invertir en concentrados para la ganadería, ya que es el adecuado para poder alimentar a sus animales, este crédito le dará los recursos económicos para que pueda realizar una buena inversion y así mismo a futuro poder tener la opción de vender.

Baltazar quiere continuar trabajando la ganadería y espera tener este apoyo financiero para poder crecer y mejorar sus condiciones.
texts.en:
Baltazar is 54 years old and lives with his wife who is 52 years old.  They have children who live outside the home, and he is involved in cattle breeding and has three cows and a calf.  He makes regular purchases and sales of livestock, and he has more 30 years in this business, which he learned from his father.

He is making a request for a loan so that he can invest in concentrates for cattle feed, as this is necessary to feed their animals.  This credit will give economic resources so that he can make a good investment, and also look ahead at having the option to sell them.

Baltazar wants to continue working with livestock and hopes to have the financial support to grow his business and improve their economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed concentrate.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a thirty six year old woman with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is a nurse and has been in service for eight years.  She says that tending to the sick is more of a calling to her than a profession, and she is happy despite the challenge of a low salary.

Like most good mothers, Margaret dreams of educating all her children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification. Margret is requesting a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Naume

texts.en: Naume is a 48-year-old married woman with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling jerrycans (used for transporting water) for four years; she supplements her business income by farming. She began this business in order to sustain her family when her husband had an accident and could not work any more. She hopes to educate her children. Her challenges are competition and inadequate capital. Her business plan includes venturing into new markets. Naume intends to use the loan to buy jerrycans to sell.

loans.use: to buy jerrycans to sell.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is 47 years old, married and the mother of five children. She works very hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines. She is requesting a loan for PHP 13,000 from NWTF to buy more items to sell in her store. Yolanda has been in her current line of work for two years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar and groceries. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Lory

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Lory works hard to support her family. She has a fishing and fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig fattening. 

Lory is borrowing 17,000 PHP through NWTF to buy materials for the repair of the fishing boat used in her business.

In the past, Lory has sustained her business activities through 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that, through hard work, she can fulfill her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for the repair of her fishing boat.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving and copra (coconut meat) businesses in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy materials for her abaca weaving business.

NWTF is listing Evelyn's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her abaca weaving.

loans.name: Abel Ernesto

texts.es:
Abel, tiene 29 años de edad, vive con sus padres, ellos trabajan en la agricultura, siembran maíz, pipián, desde pequeño aprendió de su padre este trabajo, hoy en día les colabora y así mismo puede generar ingresos.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas y preparación del terreno, ya que este material es muy necesario para poder fortalecer la siembra, espera tener una buena cosecha de pipián y maíz.
Su objetivo con el préstamo es fortalecer el cultivo a través de la compra de abono, tener una mejor condición en el campo.
texts.en:
Abel is 29 years old and lives with his parents.  They all work in agriculture, planting corn, squash, and since he was little, he has been learning this work from his father.  These days, they work together and thus generate their income.

He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and preparations for the soil, since these materials are very necessary to strengthen the seeds, and they hope to have a good harvest of squash and corn.

His goal with this loan is to strengthen his crops through the use of fertilizers, and to have a better life in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and additives for his land.

loans.name: Carlos Javier

texts.es:
Carlos, es agricultor, vive con una hermana, está soltero, él aprendió muy joven a realizar la siembra de maíz, con las cosechas a logrado vender y realizar ingresos, colaborando así con los gastos del hogar.
El está solicitando un préstamo para realiza la compra de insumos agrícolas, ya que está realizando la siembra y deberá comprarse abono, herbicidas, que le ayudaran a mejorar los cultivos.

Su objetivo es poder crear mejores cosechas, aumentando la capacidad en el terreno, porque así tendrá para vender más y crear ingresos.
texts.en: Carlos works in agriculture.  He’s single and lives with his sister.  He learned while still very young to plant corn.  He’s managed to sell his crops and earn income helping with household expenses this way.  He’s requesting a loan to buy farm supplies because he’s starting to plant and needs to buy manure and herbicide that will help him improve his crops.  His objective is to create better harvests increasing his soil capacity because he’ll then have more to sell and to create income.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Con un préstamo de 21,000 pesos, Mariano ha podido comprar la mercancía que le ha permitido aumentar el inventario de su tienda en la calle.
Mariano es un comerciante conocido en su zona, pues tiene 21 años con su puesto de venta en la calle. Con el mismo ha sostenido a su familia y pudo apoyar a sus hijos, que así lo decidieron, a pagar sus estudios en la universidad. El más pequeño, con 22 años recién terminó la universidad, donde estudió contabilidad.  
Don Mariano es casado, su esposa ha sido toda la vida ama de casa. Mientras el trabajaba en la tienda, ella se hacía cargo del hogar y de sus cinco hijos.Hoy día, solo sus dos hijos más pequeños viven en casa (25 y 22), pues los demás ya se han casado.
texts.en:
With 21,000 peso loan, Mariano has been able to buy merchandise to increase his inventory in his street stand.  Mariano is a well-known merchant in his zone because he’s had a street stand for 21 years.  He’s supported his family with it and was able to pay for his children’s university studies when they decided to go.  His youngest, who is 22-years-old, completed university; he studied accounting.

Mariano is married and his wife has been a housewife her entire life.  While he worked in his stand she took care of the home and their five children.  Today, only his two youngest children (25 and 22) still live at home because the others have all gotten married already.

loans.use: to buy merchandise  stock his sales stand.

loans.name: Specioza

texts.en: Specioza is a 37-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She has been running a pub for two years. She started with 300,000 UGX in capital; now her working capital is 1,500,000 UGX. Her main hardship is high taxes. She is working hard to ensure good profits so she can attain her goals of buying land to grow crops and educating her children. Specioza intends to use the loan to buy beer to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer to sell.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 30 years old and the mother of four children. She lives with her family in the town of Samburu, where she runs a business selling charcoal. She has been in this line of work for three years and is successfully helping to support her family. She is requesting her fourth loan, for 40,000 KES, to restock her store with more sacks of charcoal. This will improve her sales and her earnings, and allow her to meet her goal of growing her business so that her children can continue their studies and enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to restock her store with more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Maria Amparo

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de frutas y bebidas como gaseosas, jugos, agua, ella vive con su esposo y un hijo, la vivienda es familiar junto a otros parientes, ella realiza sus ventas en una de las terminales de buses.
Solicita un préstamo para comprarse fruta fresca como sandia, mangos, gaseosas, jugos y agua, que son algunos de los productos que vende, este crédito le ayudara para mejorar el negocio; uno de sus riesgos es la delincuencia y también las lluvias, que afectan sus ventas.
Su aspiración es a futuro tener vivienda propia, apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios para que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
María works selling fruit and beverages like soft-drinks, juice and water.  She lives with her husband and son.  The house is a family home and they live with other relatives.  She does her sales at one of the bus terminals.

She requests the loan to buy fresh fruit like watermelon, mangoes and also soft-drinks, juices and water which are the products she sells.  This loan will help her improve the business.  Her risks are crime and the rain which affect her sales.  Her future goal is to own a house and to support her children’s schooling so that they can improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy watermelon, mangoes, soft-drinks, juices and water.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en: Marlene is a hardworking entrepreneur who earns a living by selling spices in the Philippines. She is requesting a loan for PHP 27,000 from NWTF to buy more spices to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 10 years, and supplements her income by selling food. Marlene has successfully sustained her business through hard work and loans from NWTF. Her dream is to save enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more spices to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Ayesha

texts.en:
Ayesha is 34 years old, married, and has children.  She enjoys doing work of hand embroidery. She initiated her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory. She is famous for designing bridal dresses in her community and most of her clients are her neighbors. 

Ayesha is requesting a loan for 30,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation, which she will use to buy more frames, needles and threads of different colors. In order to meet the growing demand for her embroidery, she needs to engage more women.   She expects a boost in her net income through her large sales. Kashf Foundation's micro-finance services enabled her to improve the standard of living of her family and send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase frames, needles, and threads of different colors.

loans.name: Marcos Humberto

texts.es:
Marcos, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, tiene 45 años de edad, vive en casa de su hermana, trabaja desde hace 10 años, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre.
Actualmente está realizando la siembra de maíz, para esto solicita un préstamo que le ayude a comprarse 4 sacos de abono, los cuales serán utilizados en la siembra para fortalecer la cosecha.
Su objetivo es mejorar su condición de vida a través de los cultivos, asi salir adelante con sus gastos.
texts.en:
Marcos works growing basic grains.  He’s 45-years-old and lives in his sister’s house.  He’s been working for 10 years; he learned this occupation from his father.

He’s currently planting corn and is asking for a loan that will help him buy four sacks of manure that will be used to strengthen the crops.  His goal is to improve his living conditions by means of his crops and thus be able to cover his expenses.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of manure.

loans.name: Edwin Orlando

texts.es: El joven Edwin de 29 años de edad, es soltero actualmente no trabaja es estudiante de la carrera de ingeniería en telecomunicaciones está en la última etapa de su profesión, apoyado por su hermana quien le cubre los gastos universitarios, el solicita apoyo de crédito para poder pagar su curso de titulación para alcanzar sus metas y llegar a ejercer sus conocimientos, así tener mayor enlace en el mercado laboral y llenar sus expectativas.
texts.en: Edwin, 29, is a young single man who is currently not working; he’s a university student majoring in telecommunications engineering.  He’s in the final stage of his professional training supported by his sister who pays his university expenses.  He’s requesting loan support to pay for his final degree course in order to meet his goals and put his learning into practice having a better tie to the labor market and to fulfill his expectations.

loans.use: to pay his final course fees.

loans.name: Salimata

texts.fr:
Madame  SALIMATA est née vers 1956 à Sikasso, elle réside avec son époux et leurs deux enfants à Noumousso, un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Kadiolo ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Madame  SALIMATA, fait la commercialisation de pagnes wax  et de tasses il y a plus de 20 ans. Elle mène son activité dans sa famille au quartier Noumousso où elle est beaucoup sollicitée par sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante elle collabore avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis maintenant 9 ans. Après des prêts solidaires elle est à son deuxième prêt individuel. Tous les prêt précédents ont été correctement  remboursés.   SALIMATA compte acheter, 15 pièces de pagnes wax et 1 douzaine de tasses auprès des grossistes et revend en détail au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle diverse et variée. 
Elle envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 75 000 FCFA dont  une partie sera utilisé pour payer les intérêts de son prêt et l’autre partie sera épargnée.
Elle ambitionne d’achever la construction de ses chambres dans sa cours.
texts.en:
Salimata was born around 1956 in Sikasso, where she lives with her husband and their two children. They reside in Noumousso, a popular district in the city of Kadiolo (located in the third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

Salimata has been running her business selling wax "pagnes" (colorful West African cloth) and basins for more than 20 years. She works from her family's home in Noumousso, where she is very sought out by her clients for the quality of the products she sells. In order to meet the ever-growing demand of her customers, Salimata has been a member of the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso for the past nine years. Following many group loans, she is currently on her second individual loan cycle. All of her previous loans have been repaid in full. With this loan, Salimata intends to purchase 15 wax "pagnes" (colorful West African cloth) and one dozen basins from wholesalers. She will resell them at retail for cash and on credit to her diverse and varied clientele.

With this loan, Salimata hopes to earn an average monthly income of 75,000 FCFA. Part of this income will be used to pay the interest on her loan, and the rest she plans to save for the future. Her goal is to eventually use her savings to finish the construction being done on her home.

loans.use: to buy wax "pagnes" (traditional colorful West African cloth) and basins for resale.

loans.name: Nonsi

texts.es: Nonsi, de 25 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de Elsa, su esposa. Ambos tienen una hija: Evelyn a la que cuidan en la casa que compraron hace 2 años. El trabajo al que dedicó 8 años de su vida es la construcción de casas. Desde muy joven encontró la manera de subsistir en el oficio de albañil, gracias a su trabajo pudo ahorrar y comprar su propia casa. Comenta que gracias a su trabajo conoce muchos lugares y ciudades, pues tiene trabajos de construcción por todo el país, “trabajo no me falta, cuando termino de construir una casa, tengo otra en pendiente; por eso espero tener mayor capital de trabajo para poder proyectarme a mejores obras”, afirma. Este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, agradece la oportunidad de progreso que le brindaron en su anterior crédito. Por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le ayudó a mejorar en su negocio. Nonsi, invertirá el dinero en la compra de madera al por mayor para realizar las construcciones.
texts.en:
Nonsi, 25, is a responsible man.  He lives with his wife, Elsa.  They have a daughter, Evelyn, who they care for in the house they bought two years ago.  He has spent 8 years of his life building houses.  He found the way to subsist as a construction worker when he was still very young and thanks to his work he was able to buy his own house.  He comments that thanks to his work he’s gotten to know many places and cities because he has construction jobs all over the country.  “I have no lack of work.  When I finish building a house I already have another one waiting.  This is why I hope to have more working capital so that I can vie for better jobs,” he affirms.  

This is his third MFP loan.  He is grateful for the opportunity for progress he got with his previous loan.  Because of this he promises to be punctual with his installment payments because it helped him improve his business.  Nonsi will use the money to buy lumber to build with at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy lumber at wholesale.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
Rosalina, de 55 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo Eugenio, con quien tuvo 4 hijos, pero solo vive uno de ellos: Miguel, en la casa que compró hace 30 años.  Desde hace 10 años comenzó su camino por la agricultura, en un inicio solo sembraba productos agrícolas como papa, oca y demás tubérculos. Conforme paso el tiempo comenzó a incursionar en la crianza de vacas, ovejas, las cuales cuida con mucho esmero y dedicación según comenta, gracias a la venta de leche y elaboración de queso, puede sostener los gastos del hogar, por lo que es indispensable cuidar de su salud y calidad. Ahora desea aumentar la cantidad de ganados que posee para así poder seguir trabajando sin inconvenientes. Este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, en todo este tiempo demostró ser puntual y responsable sobre todo gusta de pertenecer a su asociación “virgen de Fátima”,  que lo conforman personas solidarias y con espíritu emprendedor.
Desea comprar más animales
texts.en:
Rosalina is a 55 year old, simple woman.  She lives with her ​​husband Eugene, with whom she had four children, but only one of them is still alive: Miguel.  She lives in the house she bought 30 years ago.  Over the past 10 years, she began her journey into agricultural work, initially only sowing agricultural products like potatoes, oca, and other tubers.  As time went on, she began to dabble in raising cows, sheep, those which take a great deal of care and dedication, as she says.  

Thanks to the sale of milk and cheese production, she is able to cover the household expenses, so it is essential to care for their health and the quality of the milk.  Now she wants to increase the number of cattle that she has, in order to continue working without any inconvenience. This loan is her seventeenth with MFP.  In all this time, she has proved to be punctual and responsible, and she especially likes belonging to her association group "The Virgin of Fatima," (virgen de Fátima) which brings together people with entrepreneurial spirit and solidarity.  She wants to buy more animals.

loans.use: to buy more animals.

loans.name: Rosa Marlene

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Vallecito, en el Distrito de Tambogrande.  Rosa vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.
Rosa cuenta con 1,0 has de terreno agrícola todo sembrado de limón que cosecha semanalmente, adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de ovinos y aves de corral, negocios bien asistidos, con más de 8 años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio, su conviviente lo apoya en las actividades que realiza.
Rosa ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles, cuyo destino será el mantenimiento del cultivo de limón, fertilización, poda y limpieza, además para la compra de alimentos para sus animales ovinos y pavos con esto lograra una mejor producción de limón y un mejor tamaño de sus animales lo cual le genera mejores ingresos y seguir creciendo
texts.en:
Rosa is 33 years old.  She lives with her partner and has two children.  She lives in her own home which is located in the small village of Vallecito, in Tambogrande district.  Rosa lives in the rural part of this district and the only basic service she receives is electricity.

Rosa has 1.0 hectares of farmland where she grows lemons that she harvests weekly.  She also raises sheep and farmyard birds.  She puts a lot of work into her businesses and has more than eight years experience.  Her partner supports her in her work.  Rosa has requested a loan for 3,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to maintain her lemon crop, fertilizing, pruning and weeding.  She will also buy feed for her sheep and turkeys.  This will enable her to achieve a better yield from her lemons and increase her number of animals.  This will make her better income and she will be able to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to maintain her crops and buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her livestock

loans.name: Dono

texts.ru: Доно женщина 38 лет.   Она замужем и имеет  двоих детей.   В нашей  организации кредитуется  более 9 лет. Начинала свой бизнес с мелкой торговли но на данной момент её бизнес значительно расширился.   Муж помогает ей в реализации бизнеса и кроме этого частично занимается плотничеством. Доно покупает товар с города Истаравшан и реализует его на местном рынке.  Она  очень ответственная, добросовестная, пунктуальная и не разу не нарушала политику организации. На полученный кредит хочет закупить продукты питания.   Она выражает свою благодарность    организациям таким как Арванд.
texts.en: Dono is a 38 year-old woman.  She is married and has two children.  She has been obtaining financing from our organization for over nine years.  She started her business with small-scale retail, but her business has expanded significantly since then.  Her husband helps her with business sales and is also involved in carpentry part-time.  Dono buys merchandise in the city of Istaravshan and sells it at a local market.  She is very responsible, conscientious and punctual, and never violated the politics of the organization.  She wants to use this loan to purchase food products.  She expresses her gratitude to organizations like Arvand.

loans.use: to purchase food products

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 33 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de su esposo Ricardo con quien  tiene 3 hijos a los que cuida en la casa que compró hace un año. Todas las mañanas desde las primeras horas del día, sale a trabajar para mantener su negocio en buenas condiciones. Durante la madrugada prepara el desayuno que consta de caldos nutritivos para los comerciantes. Pues el local que alquiló, se ubica en una zona céntrica de la localidad, de lunes a domingo, sin descanso, cuida de su negocio, pues es el único ingreso económico de su familia. “Mi esposo y yo nos dedicamos a tiempo completo en nuestro restaurante, pues tenemos muchos clientes, por ese motivo contratamos personal adicional para que nos ayude a mejorar nuestras ganancias”, afirma. Este es el crédito número 2 con MFP, agradece la oportunidad de progreso que le brindaron en su anterior crédito. Por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le ayudó a mejorar en su negocio.
Rosa, invertirá el dinero en la compra de mercadería como: arroz, azúcar por sacos. De esa manera podrá obtener más ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is 33 years old, and she is a cheerful woman.  She lives with her ​​husband Ricardo, with whom she has 3 children who she cares for in the home that she bought a year ago.  Every morning, in the early hours of the day she goes to work to keep her business in good condition. During the morning, she prepares a breakfast consisting of a nutritious broth for the workers. Since the place she rents is located in a central area of the town, from Monday to Sunday she stays at her business without resting, because it is the only income for her family. 

"My husband and I have been working full time in our restaurant, as we have many customers, which is why we hire additional staff to help us improve our earnings," she says. This credit is her second with MFP, and she was thankful for the opportunity for progress that she was given by her earlier loan.  For that reason, she promises to be punctual in her payments, since this has already helped to increase her business.

Rosa will invest the money in buying goods such as bulks sacks of rice and sugar. That way she can earn more profit.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar in bulk.

loans.name: Estrellas Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Estrellas” está conformado por 20 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de chalecos, costuras, repostería, venta de ropa, peluquería, venta de mermeladas, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca.
Maria Paz, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie en primera fila, ocupando el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste polera de color negra, pantalón de color café, zapatillas de color rojo y usa una cartera de color negra, su cabello es de color castaño oscuro y lo usa tomado, de adorno lleva un pañuelo alrededor de su cuello.
Ella se dedica al rubro de peluquería, desde hace 2 años. Comenta que trabaja de forma ambulante, ella se dirige a las casas de sus clientes, realiza corte de pelo, peinados y tinturas, su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad ya que se encuentra estudiando.
La mercadería e insumos que va necesitando los compra en distribuidoras y locales que se especializan en vender productos de peluquería.
Con el crédito comprará toallas, tinturas, guantes, peinetas y tijeras.
Una de las metas de Maria Paz es tener un negocio estable y grande para atender  de manera tranquila y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientelas.
Maria Paz vive junto a su madre y su hermano mayor. Sus sueños a nivel personal es tener su carrera terminada y a nivel laboral tener su propia peluquería.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Comenta que las capacitaciones han sido fundamentales para su negocio y también para su desarrollo personal, ya que ha aprendido a organizar y distribuir de mejor manera sus ingresos e inversiones. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte se encuentra muy cómoda, ya que son unidos y existe respeto.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Estrellas” (Stars) and it has 20 entrepreneurs who are in a variety of lines of work among which are vest sales, sewing, pastry making, clothes sales, barber shop, marmalade sales and services, among others.  All of them are from the city of Talca.

María Paz is a member of the communal bank.  In the photo she’s standing in the front row, first from left to right, wearing a black shirt, brown pants, red shoes and has black purse; her hair is dark brown and it’s gathered up.  She’s wearing a scarf around her neck.

She’s been working as a barber for two years.  She works from place to place.  She heads out to her customers’ homes to cut, style and color hair.  She sets up her work schedule according to her availability since she’s also studying.  The merchandise and supplies she needs she buys from suppliers and locals who specialize in selling barber products.  She will use the loan to buy towels, hair color, gloves, hair pins and scissors.

One of María Paz’s goals is to have a large, stable business to be able to work in peace and meet her customers’ needs.  María Paz lives with her mother and older brother.  Her dream on a professional level is to finish her career and exercise her profession and at a work level she’d like to own a barber shop.

She’s very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza is giving her because she’ll be able to invest in her business.  She comments that the training has been fundamental for her business and also for her personal development because she’s learned how to organize and better distribute her income and investments.  With respect to the communal bank group she’s part of she’s very comfortable because they are unite and respectful.

Talca belongs to the Maule Region in the center of the country.  It’s the administrative, economic and cultural center of the region and the most important city in the Chilean Central Valley.  There is a curious play on words in Chile about Talca: “Talca, París y Londres.” Among the myths concerning it, some say it’s derived from something originally said by an Englishman: “Talca parece Londres” because of the thick fog that frequently blankets the city in winter like in the United Kingdom ‘s capital.

loans.use: to buy towels, hair color, gloves, hair pins and scissors.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria, de 57 años, es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo Demetrio, con quien tiene 8 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos: Frank y Rusbel, a quienes cuida en la casa que compró desde hace 8 años.  
A más de 3 horas de viaje, se ubican los terrenos de Victoria, ella se ausenta de casa por varios días, pues tiene que cuidar de sus terrenos agrícolas, nutrirlos, limpiarlos y regarlos para que den buen fruto. Cuenta que desde muy joven aprendió todo lo necesario para llegar a ser una de los mejores agricultores. Junto a su esposo siembran, papa en todas sus variedades, además de maíz, alverja y tarwi (especie de fréjol con poderes curativos).  Durante los 30 años de experiencia, cuidó mucho de los clientes potenciales que tiene, por esa razón en cada cosecha ya tiene compradores fijos. Ahora espera tener éxito en su nuevo negocio de compra y venta de ganados. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente segura y estable en su negocio, pues recibe el apoyo económico de su asociación, por eso promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas.
Victoria, invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánicos para nutrir sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Victoria, aged 57, is a simple woman.  She lives with her ​​husband Demetrio, with whom she has eight children, but she only lives with two of them: Frank and Rusbel, who she looks after in the house she bought 8 years ago.

More than 3 hours away, Victoria has plots of land.  She is away from home for several days at a time in order to care for her farmland, to add nutrients, turn the soil, and irrigate them to get a good harvest. She says that since she was very young, she has been learning all the skills necessary to become one of the best  farmers.  Together with her husband, they sow potatoes of all different varieties.  In addition, they grow maize, green peas, and lupin (a type of bean with curative powers). 

During her 30 years of experience, she took great care of all the potential customers, and for that reason, each harvest already has fixed buyers. Now she expects to succeed in her new business of buying and selling cattle.  This is her fifth loan with MFP, so she feels secure and stable in her business, and she receives financial support from her association, so she promises to be punctual in paying her dues.

Victoria will invest the money in buying organic fertilizer to nourish their future crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers to add nutrients to her future crops.

loans.name: Emma

texts.es:
Emma tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y tiene 02 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Ayar Uchu del Distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito y aún no cuenta con servicios básicos.

La actividad que desarrolla la titular es la venta y crianza de ganado menor, los cuales engorda y una vez con peso y tamaño ideal los comercializa en mercado local. Cuenta con 6 años de experiencia en el negocio. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y cuenta con 8 has de terreno agrícola.  Con los ingresos que percibe cubre sus gastos y trata de mantener la calidad de vida 

Emma desea comprar más animales menores para engordarlos y posteriormente venderlos, es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1100 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Emma is 43 years old, married, and has 2 children in her charge. She lives in her own house, which is located in Caserio Ayar Uchu, Tambogrande district. Emma lives in the rural portion of the district and still lacks basic services.

The activity she is involved in is raising and selling smaller livestock. Emma fattens them and once they gain weight and reach an ideal size, she sells them in the local market. She has 6 years of experience in the business. Her husband works in agriculture and has 8 hectares of agricultural land. With their incomes, they cover their expenses and attempt to maintain their quality of life.  

Emma wishes to buy more small livestock to fatten and, later, sell. This is why she finds it convenient to borrow 1,100 new sols through Edpyme Alternativa to achieve her objective.

loans.use: buy small livestock to fatten and sell.

loans.name: José Angel

texts.es:
Con un préstamo de 31,500 pesos, José Angel ha podido comprar una silla y rasurador eléctrico para su peluqueria. El es un hombre de trato fácil y al que le gusta conversar, por lo que su profesión como peluquero del barrio va perfecta con su personalidad. Inició en el negocio hace 13 años y con el mismo sostiene su familia. Su esposa es ama de casa y cuida del hogar y de sus dos niños de 8 y 10 años, quienes están en la escuela pública. José Angel necesitaba cambiar la silla anterior por que ya estaba deteriorada, además quería comprar un modelo donde sus clientes se sientan más cómodos.
En este momento la casa donde José Angel vive con su familia está techada de zinc, por lo que su deseo para el futuro es poder tener un techo de concreto, que sea más seguro en temporada de huracanes.
texts.en: With a 31,500 peso loan José Ángel has been able to buy a chair and an electric shaver for his barber shop.  He’s a pleasant man who likes to chat which is why being a barber goes perfectly with his personality.  He started the business 13 years ago and he supports his family by means of it.  His wife is a housewife who cares for their home and for their two children who are 8 and 10 years of age and attend public school.   José Ángel needed to replace his old chair because it was worn down and he wanted to buy one better designed for his customers’ comfort.  At present, the house José Ángel and his family live in has a metal roof so his future wish is to replace it with concrete which is safer during hurricane season.

loans.use: to buy a chair and an electric shaver for his barber shop.

loans.name: Davlat

texts.ru: Давлат проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. Давлат более пяти лет занимается растениеводством. Он в основном выращивает картошку, морковку и другие виды овощей в зависимости от времени года. Давлат просит кредит для закупа семян и топлива.
texts.en: Davlat lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 25 years old, married.  Davlat has been involved in agriculture for over five years.  He primarily grows potatoes, carrots and other types of vegetables, depending on the season.  Davlat is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fuel.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fuel

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Accesorios como telas en mayor volumen, correderas, encajes, adornos, hilos, fue lo que compró  la señora Maria y con ello se siente muy satisfecha, además de entusiasmada, porque aumentó su potencial de oferta y obtuvo descuentos por compras de contado. En la actualidad prepara su creatividad para recibir las fiestas de fin de año, en las cuales cada miembro de la familia desea lucir elegantemente vestido y es aquí donde ella hace su mejor venta del año. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará telas y accesorios muy decorativos, su éxito radia en la calidad y el amor que le pone a su tarea y esto lo retribuye una excelente clientela que cada vez mas se fideliza. La señora Maria envía un mensaje a sus financiadores de Kiva: “Estoy agradecida con toda la ayuda proporcionada por ustedes, Dios multiplique la labor que realizan. “
texts.en:
María bought accessories like fabric in larger amounts, zippers, lace, decorations and thread and she feels very satisfied with them.  She’s also excited because she increased her sales potential and got discounts for cash purchases.  She’s currently getting her creativity ready to receive end-of-year festivities which is when every family member wants to look their best which and is when she has her best sales of the year.

She’s currently applying for a new Kiva loan to buy fabric and very decorative accessories.  Her success rests in the quality and love she puts into her work which is rewarded by an excellent clientele who become more and more loyal to her each time. 

María sends a message to Kiva lenders: “I am grateful for all the help you’ve provided; may God multiply the work you do.”

loans.use: to buy fabric and very decorative accessories.

loans.name: Abduzoir

texts.ru: Абдузоир проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 52 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Жена Абдузоира домохозяйка. Абдузоир сам занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он более семнадцати лет. Абдузоир в основном занимается выращиванием овощей. Он берет кредит для закупа семян.
texts.en: Abduzoir lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 52 years old, married and has five children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Abduzoir is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  He has been in this field for over seventeen years.  Abduzoir primarily grows vegetables.  He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Nurmat

texts.ru: Нурмат мужчина в возрасте 51 года, женат, имеет троих детей.   Не смотря на свой возраст он очень много трудится. Нурмат ответственный, добросовестный и старательный человек. Нурмат с 18 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Он выращивает лук, пшеницу, кукурузы и другие сельхоз культуры. Кроме этого Нурмат  занимается откармливанием  крупно  рогатого и мелко рогатого скота.Его жена  в этом ему помогает е. Нурмат  и его жена стараются чтобы их жизненные условия  стали  лучше и дети получили образование в будущем . Он  кредитуется в  «Арванд» несколько лет и не разу не нарушал политику кредитования. На полученный кредит он хочет приобрести скот.  Нурмат  очень    благодарен  таким организациям как Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Nurmat is a 51 year-old man, who is married and has three children.  Despite his age, he works a lot.  Nurmat is a responsible, conscientious and diligent person.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops since he was 18 years old.  He grows onions, wheat, corn and other agricultural crops.  Besides this, Nurmat is involved in raising cattle and small livestock.  His wife helps him with this business.  Nurmat and his wife try very hard to improve their living conditions and to ensure that their children would have education in the future.  He has been obtaining financing from Arvand for several years and never violated the credit rules.  He wants to use this loan to buy livestock.  Nurmat is very grateful to organizations like Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
Flora tiene 47 años, vive con su esposo y sus 5  hijos, hace 4 años en la casa de sus familiares. Desde hace 16 años se dedica a vender frutas, verduras, hortalizas y demás alimentos de temporada en compañía de su esposo de manera ambulante. El triciclo que posee le ayuda a transportar su mercadería, siempre se abastecen de alimentos de temporada, los que compra al por mayor, trabaja todos los días recorriendo las calles comerciales y las ferias de su ciudad; gracias a su parlante puede comunicar  y obtener más clientes. Este negocio le permite tener buenas ganancias ya que es muy rentable, pues vende los alimentos de mayor demanda en su ciudad. En este tiempo de experiencia han aprendido las mejores técnicas para ventas. Ahora se encuentra en la venta de ajo pelado, pues el precio de compra es mayor en esta temporada. Este es el crédito número 7 con MFP, en todo este tiempo demostró ser puntual y responsable sobre todo gusta de pertenecer a su asociación,  que lo conforman personas solidarias y con espíritu emprendedor.
Flora, invertirá el dinero en la compra de más cosechas de ajo para su venta.
texts.en:
Flora is 47 years old and has lived with her husband and their 5 children for the past 4 years in their relatives' home.  For 16 years, she has been selling fruits, vegetables and other seasonal foods alongside her husband as a street vendor. The tricycle they own helps them to transport their goods, and they always fill their cart with seasonal foods, which she buys in bulk.  She works every day shopping and walking the commercial streets of her town and through the farmers' markets of the city.  Thanks to her language abilities, she can communicate and gain more customers. 

This business allows her to gain better earnings because it is very profitable, as she is able to sell more food in bulk in response to demand in her city.  After all her time of experience, she has learned the best techniques for sales.  She is now engaging in the sale of peeled garlic, because the purchase price is higher this time of year. This loan is her seventh with MFP, and in all this time she has proved to be punctual and responsible especially in regards to her association, which is made up of people with an entrepreneurial spirit and common interest.

Flora will invest this money in buying more garlic crops for sale.

loans.use: Comprar más cosechas de ajos

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La Sra.  Juana tiene 30 años, casada con dos hijos que son de las edades de 5 y 16 años, ella  se dedica  a la   venta de variedad de ropa de temporada y en esta ocasión se dedica a la variedad de poleras, blusas y pantalones, ella tiene un puesto fijo en uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de La Paz donde ofrece sus productos,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Juana va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de variedad de  de ropa  por mayor y de esta manera brindar variedad de ropa  a su clientela e incrementar sus ganancias,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio y también que se acerca la época de calor y las poleras tienen mucha demanda, la Sra. Juana va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de ropa, la Sra. Juana es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Juana is 30 years old and married with two children who are ages 5 and 16.  She sells a variety of seasonal clothing, and at this time, her inventory is devoted to a variety of T-shirts, blouses. and pants.  She has a permanent stall in one of the busiest markets in the city of La Paz, where she shows her products for sale.  

This loan is her second round with the institution, and Juana will use this loan to purchase a variety of wholesale clothing, and thereby provide variety of clothing to her customers and increase her profits.  Her reason for applying for this loan is to continue to improve her business and also to be prepared as the hot season approaches and the T-shirts are in high demand.  Juana will use the profits to continue stocking a variety of clothing.  Juana is a hardworking person, who is happy about the opportunity provided for her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Ms. Kousar is a vigorous 43-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She has had a hand-embroidery business for five years. She is passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Her husband works, but he does not earn enough to support his family well. Kousar’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the main bread winner in her household. 

To meet increasing demand, she requested a loan of Rs 25000 to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities. Kousar wants to grow her business, and her dream is to run a training center for girls of her village. She would teach embroidery skills, so they can help her expand her business and can also earn money for themselves. She is also interested in opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en: Leonisa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business selling firewood in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years. Leonisa requested a 20000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more firewood to sell. In the future, Leonisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase firewood.

loans.name: Suren

texts.en:
Suren is still running his flower business, selling bunches and wreaths in a rented space in the market. Suren’s younger son has already graduated and now helps his father in the business. 
 
Suren used his first loan to buy a car for his business and his second loan to buy flowers and accessories for his flower trading business. Suren is requesting his third loan for 1,000,000 AMD, which he will use to buy a large lot of roses, pinks, lilies, irises, chrysanthemums, and other flowers from greenhouses as well as buy different accessories for his business.

loans.use: to purchase flowers from greenhouses and different accessories for his business.

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед  молодой парень в возрасте 25 лет. Он плотник. Чамшед женат имеет одного ребенка.  Он почти уже 12 лет работает потником и у  него стабильная  работа. Он производит столы и стулья из дерева. У него очень много клиентов. Это его единственный доход.  На полученный кредит Чамшед  хочет закупить доски и мебельные краски. Он мечтает чтобы его ребенок учился в лучших учебных заведениях и поэтому усердно  трудится. Чамшед благодарит Арванд и очень рад что с помощью таких организаций люди могут улучшить свои условия проживания.
texts.en: Jamshed is a young man who is 25 years old and works as a carpenter.  He is married with one child.  He has been working as a carpenter for nearly 12 years and he has stable work.  Jamshed makes wooden tables and chairs and he has many clients.  Carpentry is his only source of income.  On receiving his loan, Jamshed would like to buy a desk and furniture paints.  It is his dream for his child to study at the best institutions and this is why he works so hard.  Jamshed thanks Arvand and is very glad that people can improve their living conditions with the help of such organizations.

loans.use: to buy furniture paint

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 61 years old, single, and blessed with four children. For twenty years, she's earned a living rearing and selling pigs, earning a monthly income of 59,000 KES. 

This will be her sixth loan with KADET LTD. She has asked for 100,000 KES, and she plans to use it to purchase additional piglets to raise. Grace will put 
the anticipated profit directly back into the business. Her dreams and hopes for the future are to be stable and be able to sustain her family.

loans.use: purchase piglets to raise.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha previously accessed an 10,000 PHP loan to purchase farm inputs needed in her business growing garden plants. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in her family's personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizer, seeds and tools for maintenance of the garden business. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Editha hopes her business grows in the coming years, and she dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and it's where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, seeds and tools for her plant-growing business.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is 45 years old, married and has four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Melba is borrowing PHP 22000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed for her pigs.

Melba has been raising pigs for eight years and earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a 23-year-old married woman from Loon, Bohol. She has no children yet. She has been in the fish vending business for two years. In addition selling fish, she has a cellphone reloading business. She earns three thousand pesos a month by operating both businesses. 

Emily plans to use this loan to buy a box or styrofoam container for fish storage, and a bicycle for transportation when selling fish. In the future, Emily would like to expand her business in order to continue being successful in her ventures.

loans.use: to buy a box or styrofoam container for fish storage and a bicycle

loans.name: Rogelio José

texts.es:
El señor Rogelio José,  posee un negocio de venta de bisuterías ubicado en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de León, desde hace doce años el realiza esta labor para llevar el sustento a toda su familia, es padre de tres  hijos los que  están bajo su responsabilidad. Sale de su casa de habitación a las 6:00 am, abre su negocio a las 6:30 am exhibiendo su producto y finalizando sus labores a las 3:00 pm. Realiza sus compras dos veces por semana en la ciudad de Managua, su negocio lo inició en uno de los mercados de león como vendedor ambulante con un capital producto de ahorro. 

El  crédito que solicita a CEPRODEL lo utilizara  para comprar al por mayor Relojes y lentes ya que tiene mayor demanda  esto permitirá ofrecerle a su clientela precios más cómodos, gracias al crédito anterior su negocio ha crecido con productos de mejor calidad así ha obtenido mayores ingresos y ha mejorando su nivel de vida tanto de  él  como la de  su familia. 

Los sueños de Rogelio, es que su negocio continúe creciendo con nuevos productos y ayudar a la formación de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Rogelio José has a business selling trinkets in one of the markets in the city of León. He has been doing this work for twelve years in order to support his family. He is father to three children for whom he is responsible. He leaves his home at 6:00am, opens his business at 6:30am to display his products and finishes work at 3.00pm. He makes his purchases twice a week in the city of Managua. He started up his business in one of the markets in León as a traveling salesman financed by his savings. 

The loan which he is requesting from CEPRODEL will be used to buy watches and glasses wholesale, as his greatest demand is for these items. This will allow him to offer better prices to his clients. Thanks to his previous loan, he has expanded his business with better quality products, obtaining higher earnings and improving both his and his family's quality of life.  

Rogelio's dream is for his business to carry on growing with new products, and to contribute to the education of his small children.

loans.use: to buy watches, luxury and custom made glasses, and wallets.

loans.name: Majeeda

texts.en: Majeeda is 55 years old and a vigorous woman. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Two years ago she began the work of hand embroidery in her house. She knows the art of embroidery very well. She makes enough to lead a decent life. She provides for two children and wishes to send them to school. Due to lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She is been in association with Kashf for two years and requested for a loan of 30000 PKR. She intends to use this loan to buy raw materials including cloth, threads of different colors, sequins and needles to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She wishes to spend part of her profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, sequins and needles.

loans.name: Maria Theresa

texts.en:
Maria Theresa previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase farm inputs needed in her garden plant business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in her family's personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizer, seeds and tools for maintenance of the plant farm. Profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her family's daily needs and pay the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Maria Theresa hopes to be able to expand her business soon and dreams to help her children. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for gardening materials and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Nancy Guadalupe

texts.es:
Nancy, se dedica a la venta de bisutería, vive con su familia, está soltera, estudia en la universidad, ella inició el negocio en su casa de habitación, ahora mantiene un negocio fuerte de venta de lociones y bisutería, la bisutería la aprendió a través de un curso al cual asistió para poder aprender, el negocio le permite financiarse sus gastos de estudio.

Estos negocios necesitan del fortalecimiento comprando mas productos y por eso es que ella solicita un préstamo para comprarse materiales para crear aretes, collares, viseras, anillos, adquiriendo dijes, piedras, hilos, listones, y también un nuevo pedido de lociones, esto le ayudará a aumentar su negocio teniendo a la mano lo más necesario.

El objetivo de ella es poder mejorar la calidad del negocio, capacitándose constantemente en la creación de nuevos estilos en accesorios, ya que esto le permitirá aumentar la preferencia los clientes y mejorar su ganancia.
texts.en:
Nancy sells costume jewelry.  She’s single living with her family and is attending university.  She started her business at home and now keeps it strong selling lotions and costume jewelry.  She learned the costume jewelry taking a course in order to learn.  The business allows her to pay for her university.

These businesses need to be strengthened with the purchase of more merchandise and this is why she’s requesting a loan to buy materials like charms, gems, thread, ribbon to make earrings, necklaces, visors, and rings and also to buy a new order of lotions.  This will help her increase business by having what’s necessary on hand.

Her goal is to be able to improve business taking courses constantly to learn how to make new styles of accessories which will lead to her being preferred by her customers and to improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy charms, stones, thread, ribbon and an order of lotions.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is married and has a copra (dried coconut meat) business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years and works hard to support her family.

Rosalie is requesting a loan for 10,000 PHP from NWTF, which she will use to buy more copra to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough to  expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more copra to sell.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 34 years old and a father of  two children. He is a dairy farmer in Olkalau town and has been in the business for seven years. He is married to Hannah, who is in the poultry business.

This is his second loan term from KADET LTD and he plans to use the amount to buy a dairy cow. This will enable him to increase milk production and thereby increase income with which he plans to buy a piece of land.

In the future, John hopes to improve his dairy farming business and also invest in cash crop farming.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Asatyllo

texts.ru: Асатулло – 58 лет, женат, отец 6 детей. Занимается откормом, куплей и продажей скота.  Кредитуется в нашей организации с 2010 года. Предыдущие кредиты Асатулло брал для увеличения поголовья скота. Асатулло выдал замуж дочерей, женил сыновей, имеет внуков. Он любящий отец, добрый и хороший дедушка и очень этим гордиться. 2 сыновей Асатулло с семьями живут с ним. Сыновья помогают ему по хозяйству. На полученный кредит Асатулло хочет закупить строительные материалы и вместе с сыновьями  отремонтировать коровник. Он выражает благодарность за финансовую помощь нашей организации.
texts.en:
Asatyllo is 58 years old, married, and a father of 6 children. He purchases, raises, and resells livestock. Asatyllo has been a client of MDO Arvand, LLC since 2010. He took his previous loans to increase the size of his herd. 

Asatyllo has held weddings for all his sons and daughters and now has grandchildren. He is a loving father, as well as a kind grandfather, and is very proud of this. Two of his sons and their families live with Asatyllo and help him run the household.

Asatyllo wants to use this loan to purchase building materials and, together with his sons, repair the barn where he keeps his cows. Asatyllo is grateful to Arvand for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials and repair his barn

loans.name: Melba Del Carmen

texts.es:
señora Melba, es originaria del departamento de Masaya, es casada, tiene la edad de 61 años, posee su propio negocio desde hace 5 años, comenzó con capital propio, y es una pulpería  la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación, el cual ella misma la administra, ella vende  leña, fresco natural, gluglú, crema y leche, entre otros. 
tambien sale a comercializar su producto fuera de su barrio,  lo que es refresco naturales, esto para brindarle una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
Cabe mencionar que  necesita aumentar su mercadería en el negocio por lo que solicita a Ceprodel un prestamo que le permita comprar los productos como:  Glu-Glu, leña, leche, crema, y nacatamales ya elaborados.
Uno de sus sueños en sacar adelante a su familia y darle un techo digno y mejores comodidades.
texts.en:
Melba is from Masaya Department.  She’s married and 61-years-old.  She has had a business of her own for five years.  She started it with her own capital.  It’s a grocery store located at home that she runs herself.  She sells firewood, natural fruit drinks, Glu-Glu [brand of non-carbonated fruit drinks], cream and milk, among others.  In order to earn a bit more and provide her family with better living conditions she goes outside of her neighborhood to sell her product which is a natural beverage in the carpentry shop.

It’s worth mentioning that she needs to increase her stock merchandise which is why she is asking for a loan from Ceprodel to buy such products as Glu-Glu, firewood, milk, cream and ready-made nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales].  One of her dreams it to move her family forward and provide a proper home and more comfort for them.

loans.use: to buy Glu-Glu, firewood, milk, cream and nacatamales.

loans.name: Damaris De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
En el departamento de Masaya, vive doña  Damaris, tiene la edad de 33 años, su nucleo familiar es de 4, ella su esposo y sus dos hijos menores de edad. De oficio comerciante el cual consiste en venta de cerdo frito, cabeza de chancho, moronga, pepena elaborados por ella misma. 
Ya tiene 2 años de poseer su propio negocio; Ella comenzó con dinero propio el cual el esposo le facilito  para que comenzara, ella vende el  producto en su misma casa ahí le llegan a comprar sus clientes, y gente que pasa cerca de su casa. 
Los sueños de ella es tener un mejor nivel de vida  para con su familia, por lo que se presenta a la oficina a solicitar un préstamo para comprar  Cerdos,(Cabeza de cerdo, cuero),  compra de leña, chiltoma, cebolla todo para la venta de cerdo frito. De tal manera que pueda siempre dar un servicio de calidad.
texts.en:
Damaris, 33, lives in Masaya Department.  Her family consists of four people: she, her husband and two minor children.  She’s a merchant.  She sells fried pork, pig head, ‘moronga’ [blood sausage] and organ meat she prepares herself.  She’s had her own business for two years and she started it with her money of her own her husband gave her so she could get started.  She sells the product at home; her customers and people who pass by her house come in to buy.

Her dream is to have a better standard of living with her family and this is why she came by the office to request a loan to buy pigs (pig head and skin), firewood, peppers, onions and everything else related to the sale of fried pork so that she can always provide quality service.

loans.use: to buy pork (head and skin), firewood, peppers, onions, etc.

loans.name: Yader Francisco

texts.es:
El Sauce una bella ciudad del departamento de León, donde cuenta con un bello santuario señor de los milagros, donde año con año obtiene visitas de diferentes ciudades de Nicaragua en honor a este santuario. 

Yader Francisco es nacido y criado en este municipio con buenas costumbres y amor al trabajo que desde muy pequeño le enseñaron a sobrevivir con sus propios Esfuerzos como es luchar para su familia

Actualmente trabaja en uno centro estatal, donde su trabajo está ubicado a 2 Km de su casa de habitación al puesto de trabajo es por tal razón que el cliente solicita el crédito para ajuste de compra de una motocicleta con el objetivo de obtener su transporte a su trabajo. 

Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo ya con estos pequeños créditos ayudan a mejorar el trabajo de  los clientes.
texts.en:
El Sauce is a beautiful city in León Department.  The beautiful Lord of Miracles Sanctuary is located there.  Annual pilgrimages from various cities in Nicaragua are made to here in its honor.

Yader Francisco was born and raised with good customs and the love of work here.  Since he was little he was taught how to survive and strive for his family by means of his own efforts.

He currently works for the state and his job is 2 kilometers from home and this is why he’s asking for a loan to make up the difference he needs to pay the total amount for a motorcycle he needs to get to and from work.

He thanks Ceprodel and Kiva for support from these small loans that help clients do their work.

loans.use: to cover the total price of a motorcycle.

loans.name: Eva Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora Eva Mercedes posee un negocio de venta de productos bisuterías y cosméticos  en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de León, la señora sale de su casa de habitación 3:00 am ubicada en uno reparto de la ciudad de León, abre su negocio a las 4:00 am para ofertar su mercadería a toda su clientela, finalizando sus labores a las 6:00 pm.  Inició su negocio en un puesto fijo con pequeña cantidad  con un capital el cual era  producto de  aporte de su Mamá, la Señora Eva es  madre de cuatro hijos de los cuales solo uno  está a su cargo de 22 años y estudia en la universidad.

Eva  se presentó a Ceprodel a solicitar un crédito el que  utilizara para comprar por mayor prodcutos como: galletas, cigarros, dulces, gel para el cabello y joyería de fantasía en la ciudad de Managua y así obtener más ganancia,  para lograr a que su negocio crezca más y se le cumplan sus sueños como es la graduación de su hijo y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eva Mercedes runs a retail business selling costume jewelry and cosmetics in one of the city of Leon's markets.

She leaves her home, located in a development in the city, at 3:00 AM. She opens her business at 4:00 AM to make her merchandise available to all her customers. She finishes at 6:00 PM.

She began this business with a small amount of money, a contribution from her mother. 

Eva is the mother of four children. Only one is under her care, and he studies at the university.

Eva asked Ceprodel for this loan in order to buy products such as: cookies, cigarettes, candy, hair gel, and imitation jewelery in the city of Managua leading to a greater revenue, business growth, and the realization of her dreams, such as her son's graduation and improving her home.

loans.use: to buy cookies, cigars, candy, hair gel, and jewelry.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her store.

NWTF is re-listing Mercedes' business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell at her store.

loans.name: Rebeca Lorena

texts.es:
La Señora Rebeca, de oficio costurera, posee su propio taller de costura desde hace 10 años, ella  aprendió con su mama desde muy pequeña y fue la que le enseño a elaborar las piezas, como blusas, vestido, faldas, entre otros. al principio comenzó como trabajadora de su mama, pero al ver lo mucho que le gustaba y también que quería ganar un poco mas, decidió emprender su propio taller de costura , actualmente ella tiene sus propias trabajadoras y le da gracias a Dios que le ha ido muy bien.

Actualmente esta necesitando realizar unos pedidos por lo que requiere comprar materia prima para elaboracion de de  vestidos de niña en dacrón y algodón y faldas de mujer; solicita un crédito para poder satisfacer la demanda.

Cabe mencionar que los sueños de ella es tener un mejor nivel de vida  para  su familia e ir mejorando sus condiciones.
texts.en:
Rebeca’s occupation is seamstress.  She has had her own sewing workshop for the last ten years.  She learned from her mother when she was still very little; her mother taught her how to make articles of clothing like blouses, skirts and dresses among others.  At first, she started working with her mother but seeing how much she enjoyed it and also because she wanted to earn a bit more, she decided to start her own workshop and she currently has her own employees and thanks be to God she’s done very well.  

She currently needs to fill some orders and needs raw materials to make Dacron and cotton dresses for little girls and skirts for women which is why she came by the office to request a loan to be able to meet demand.  It’s worth mentioning that her dream is to have a better standard of living for her family and to gradually improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her sewing shop.

loans.name: Sharif

texts.ru: Шариф мужчина в возрасте 39 лет проживающий в сельской местности в г.Исфара.   Женат и имеет 3 детей. Супруга Шарифа не имеет высшего образования и в связи с этим она нигде не работает.   Шариф, занимается купле продажей фруктов.   Фрукты он закупает в других городах республики.   Этим бизнесом он занимается более 7 лет.    Шариф, берет  кредит для увеличения товарооборота.  Он выражает благодарность такой организации как МДО "Арванд" за своевременную поддержку.
texts.en: Sharif is a 39 year-old man, living in a rural area of the city of Isfara.  He is married and has three children.  Sharif's wife does not have higher education and does not work anywhere because of that.  Sharif is involved in buying and selling fruits.  He buys fruits from other cities of the republic.  He has been involved in this business for over seven years.  Sharif is requesting this loan to increase product turnover.  He expresses his gratitude to an organization like MDO "Arvand" for the timely support.

loans.use: to increase product turnover

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables for their vegetable selling business

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea, se dedica a la venta de comida, tiene 51 años de edad, vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad, a través del negocio Andrea ha podido subsistir y ayudar a su hogar con los gastos, tiene ya una experiencia de 20 años este negocio lo heredo de sus padres.

Para el buen funcionamiento del comedor necesita comprarse una variedad de productos por ejemplo verduras, aceite, carnes, pollo, arroz, etc. entre otros productos que son necesarios para fortalecerlo y mejorar el servicio, por eso él solicita un préstamo que le facilite el recurso económico que pueda cubrir este gasto ayudándole a mejorar la estabilidad del negocio.

El sueño de Andrea es poder tener en el negocio todo lo necesario para ofrecer a los clientes una variedad de menús, ya que esto le dará la fuerza para atraer más personas a que consuman sus alimentos, espera que esta fuente de ingresos sea duradera para mejorar la economía de su familia.
texts.en:
Andrea, 51, sells food.  She lives in her own house with her three children who are all adults now.  Andrea has been able to subsist and help cover household expenses by means of her business.  She has 20 years’ experience in this business that she inherited from her parents.

In order for her eatery to function well she needs to buy a variety of products like vegetables, oil, meat, chicken and rice, for example, among others she needs to strengthen it and to improve service.  This is why she’s requesting a loan that will provide her with the economic resource to cover this expense helping her to improve her business’ stability.

Andrea’s dream is to be able to have everything she needs on-hand to offer her customers a variety of menus because this will provide the impetus to attract more people who will consume her food; she hopes this source of income will be long-lasting to improve her family’s economy.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, oil, meat, chicken and rice.

loans.name: Cora De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Cora de los Angeles, reside en el departamento de Masaya, ella es casada, su núcleo familiar es de 4, su esposo y sus tres hijos mayores de edad, con la ayuda de su esposo han salido adelante el es trabajador asalariado como guarda de seguridad y ella comerciante  desde hace 9 años, y consiste en venta de ropa mixtos, vende en su casa, y también sale a ofrecer sus productos a sus clientes, que trabajan en las empresas  privadas o publicas. 
 
Quiere reabastecer de productos nuevos su negocio, y captar más clientes fuera del departamento,  saliendo a comercializar su producto fuera como lo es  Masatepe, San marcos, esto para obtener más y mejores ingresos en su negocio.

solicita a Ceprodel un crédito que le permita comprar la mercadería como Bikinis micro fibra, brasieres, bóxer de varón y mujer, calceta mujer y varón, trajes de niños, sandalias y Short de niños. Considera que esta ayuda le dará una mejor condición de vida para su hogar.
texts.en:
Cora de los Ángeles lives in Masaya Department.  She’s married and her nuclear family consists of four people: her husband and three minor children.  With help from her husband who is a salaried employee working as a security guard they have been getting ahead.  She’s been a merchant for nine years selling assorted clothes.  She sells at home and also goes out to sell her products to her customers who work in private or public firms.

She wants to restock with new products and to capture more customers outside the department by going out to sell her products in other places like Masatepe and San Marcos to earn more and better income in her business.

She is requesting a loan from Ceprodel to buy merchandise like microfiber bathing bikinis, brassieres, men’s and women’s boxer shorts, men’s and women’s socks, children’s outfits, sandals and children’s shorts.  She feels that this help will give her better living conditions at home.

loans.use: to buy clothes and sandals.

loans.name: Esther Adilia

texts.es:
Esther Adilia, es casada, tiene 22 años de edad, a su temprana edad ella  es comerciante y estudia a la vez su propia carrera universitaria como lo es administración de empresas, ella es  originaria del departamento de Masaya;Con un núcleo familiar de 3 personas su esposo y su hija menor de edad.

Su  negocio consite en vender mercadería como cosméticos y productos de uso personal, ella distribuye de forma ambulante, en su sector y clientes que tiene en la universidad;Ella adecua su tiempo para salir a vender sus productos a sus clientes y el cual aprovecha también para cobrar y levantar los pedidos de productos, ya que también tiene que ver por los oficios de su hogar como toda madre.
 
actualmente quiere aumentar la mercadería, esperando que las ventas se mejoren, y anticipándose a los pedidos que a ella le hacen por la temporada navideña,  solicita a Ceprodel  un crédito para comprar desodorante para varón, champú, desodorante de mujer, vanidad, estuches especiales, crema de mano, pinturas labial y pintura de uña.

Cabe mencionar que ella quiere darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia y mejor educación a su hija del cual ella esta muy orgullosa de tenerla.
texts.en:
Esther Adilia’s married and is 22-years-old.  At her young age she’s a merchant and also is attending university at the same time majoring in business administration.  She’s from Masaya Department.  Her nuclear family comprises three people: her husband and her minor daughter.

Her business consists in selling merchandise like cosmetics and personal use products.  She sells them from place to place in her neighborhood and to customers she has at the university.  She manages her time to go out selling products to her customers and also to take new orders and collect payments since like all good mothers she also has to see to her housework.

She wants to increase her merchandise hoping to improve sales and preparing for anticipated Christmas season orders.  She is requesting a loan from Ceprodel to buy men’s deodorant, shampoo, women’s deodorant, make-up, special kits, hand cream, lipstick and nail polish.  It’s worth mentioning that she wants to provide better living conditions for her family and better education for the daughter she’s so proud of having.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Sardaran

texts.en:
Ms. Sardaran is a 43-year-old active, married woman.  She has been doing excellent work in hand embroidery at her home for the last five years. She has exceptional skills in embroidery. She has gotten a lot of admiration from her community members. The demand for her collection is increasing day by day. She is contributing a lot to the family income.
