Everyday she has new hopes to perform her work successfully and thanks to God she has done it thanks to the people who are looking in the afternoon to buy from her and this has sustained her until today as she earns income and is always able to earn her daily bread for her household.

But she thinks that she needs to improve and expand her pupusas stand since she has the necessary experience for it. This is why she has reached out to Integral to ask for a loan in order to be able to buy basic supplies such as rice, beans, corn, cheese, among other items. She has not been overcome by adversity and has always gotten ahead. She is sure that she will pay off the debt promptly and that her business will improve each day.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as rice, beans, corn, cheese, and other items for her home based pupusas (stuffed tortillas) stand

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 26 years old, single and with no dependents. He sells 'mitumba' (used) clothes, a business he started five years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000. He wants to purchase two bales of skirts and a bale of blouses for sale and has requested a second loan of KES 20,000. 

The profit he makes from his business will aid him to venture out into other lines of business. His dream is to one day own real estate.

loans.use: To purchase two bales of skirts and a bale of blouses for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 30 years old, married, and lives in Airport. She stopped her education at grade 2. For the past 10  years, she has been selling rice, peppers, beans, and cassava in the  local market.  She established the business with a small loan from her father. She is requesting a loan to purchase more peppers, beans, and cassava for her business. Her plan is to buy a piece of land and build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more peppers, beans, and cassava for her business

loans.name: Besjan

texts.en:
Besjan is a 25-year-old Egyptian, married man and has two children: five and two years old. Besjan and his family live in their community in a major city in central Albania. He is a hard working young man who started working at a very young age and the only financial provider for his family.

Besjan is selling used clothes, and in addition to this activity, he does other odd jobs. He has his own hardships at times, whether financial or otherwise, yet he tries to not get discouraged. He claims that their living conditions are not where they should be, and this hurts him emotionally. 

Besjan is now requesting a loan of 120,000 Albanian Lek to stock up on seasonal inventory of used clothes to resell.

loans.use: to stock up on seasonal, second hand clothes to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Cada persona vive su vida como a lo mejor le parezca y esta mujer tiene deseos altos de superación tiene treinta años de edad y juntos a su esposo poseen una pequeña carpintería en su casa, es una mujer que se caracteriza por ser emprendedora son muy conocidos por su lugar de residencia tienen buenas referencias del trabajo que realizan desde hace 5 años. Su mayor ilusión es que el día de mañana sus hijos se sientan orgullosos de ella y de su trabajo ya que por ellos salen adelante cada día. Es muy sincera y honesta, gracias a ello ahora siempre tiene trabajos que realizar, Ella estaba pensando que desea comprar materiales ya que la demanda se lo pide pero no tiene el capital suficiente para la compra de estos es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar madera, lijas, guantes y materiales para la elaboración de lo que le pidan, cuenta con la satisfacción de que pronto su vida cambiará y ella logrará lo que mas anhela que es brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Everyone lives their life how they think it best. 

This woman has high hopes of success. She is thirty years old. Together with her husband they set up a small carpentry workshop in their home. She is characterized as an entrepreneurial woman. 

They are known where they live, and they have good references from their 5 years of work. Their greatest hope is to one day in the future have their children be proud of them and their work, since it is because of them they are moving forward. 

She is very nice, honest, and thanks to these traits she has plenty of work to do. 

She has been thinking of buying materials since the outstanding work demands it. However, she does not have enough money for the purchase of these materials. 

For this reason, she has approached INTEGRAL to request a loan to be able to purchase wood, sandpaper, gloves, and other materials to complete the work contracted. 

She has the satisfaction of changing her life so soon and she will be able to achieve what she has always yearned for, improving the lives of her children.

loans.use: to purchase different types of wood, sandpaper, gloves, and other materials

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Mujer emprendedora desea mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos. vive actualmente en una zona de alta incidencia delincuencial y espera poder algún día cambiarles ésta realidad en la que viven a sus hijos. Actualmente reside con su grupo familiar, siempre se ha esforzado para tener lo mejor y que nunca les falte nada,  Es muy alegre y trabajadora siempre con la visión de entregarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Actualmente posee un pequeño puesto de ropa donde vende camisas nuevas, pantalones a la moda, estilos diferentes entre otros. Aunque ella siente que necesita incrementar y surtir su tienda ya que los puestos alrededor tienen mejores estilos y ella se esta quedando un poco abajo con las ventas. Es por eso que solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar más blusas, sandalias, pantalones, short, entre otros y así no tendrá inconvenientes y sus ventas mejorarán. Agradece desde ya, la ayuda que espera recibir y cuenta con la bendición de Dios que poco a poco su vida y la de su familia mejorará lejos del peligro en que viven.
texts.en: This female entrepreneur wishes to improve her quality of life and that of her children. Right now she lives in an area with a high incidence of crime; She is waiting to one day have the power to change the reality of crime that her children live in. She lives with her family, and has always strived to have the very best and never want for anything. She is happy and always works hard with the vision of giving her children a better future. Currently she has a small stall where she sells new shirts, and fashionable pants in various different styles among other things. She feels that she needs to enhance and stock her store, because nearby stores already have better styles and she is a little bit low in her sales. This is why she is asking Integral for a loan in order to buy more blouses, sandals, pants, shorts, and more in order to not have problems and improve her sales. She is already thankful that with the help that she hopes to receive and with God's blessing, she be able to improve her life and that of her family and keep them away from the danger that they live in.

loans.use: to buy raw material, blouses, sandals, pants, shorts, and more

loans.name: Marta Lilian

texts.es: Es una mujer muy trabajadora honesta y sincera que siempre su mayor deseo es superarse para brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Reside con su grupo familiar y junto a su esposo se esfuerzan para que nunca les haga falta el pan de cada día en su humilde hogar, sin embargo no dejan de existir carencias, cosas que hacen falta por lo que acostumbrada a luchar por salir de la pobreza hará valer sus buenas cualidades para el comercio. Jamás se ha dejado vencer por las adversidades de la vida, sus deseos de superación son enormes. Ahora se dedica a vender especies en una zona muy conocida del país, cada mañana le toca caminar y recorrer las calles vendiendo las diferentes especies que existen y también en su casa posee una pequeña tienda en la cual vende lo poco que no logra vender en el día. Pero siente el deseo de incrementar su venta y es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder vender especies con que actualmente no cuenta como: Ajonjolí, Chile morrón, Chile guaco, Achote, Ajo, Hojas de laurel, pimienta, entre otros. Espera y confía en Dios que pronto podrá ella incrementar su venta y así tener la plena seguridad de que a sus hijos no les faltara nada el día de mañana.
texts.en:
She is a very hard-working, honest, and sincere woman.  Her biggest wish is always to improve herself in order to give her family the best.  She lives with her family, and together with her husband she puts forth great effort so that her humble household never goes without their daily bread.

Nevertheless, they still have needs, things that they lack.  She is used to struggling to get out of poverty and make good her talent for business.  She has never given up because of life’s adversities.  Her will to succeed is enormous.

She now sells spices in a well-known area of the country.  Every morning she sets out walking and going through the streets selling the different spices that there are.  She also has a small store in her house, where she sells the little that she did not manage to sell during the day.

She wishes to increase her sales, and that is why she approaches Integral to request a loan.  This way she will be able to sell spices that she currently does not have.  These include sesame, red pepper, guaco chili, annatto, garlic, laurel leaves, and black pepper, among others.

She hopes and trusts in God that she will soon be able to increase her sales.  This way she will have complete assurance that her children will lack for nothing in the future.

loans.use: to buy spices like sesame, red pepper, guaco chili, annatto, garlic, laurel leaves, and black pepper, among others.

loans.name: Aide

texts.es: La Sra. Aidé vive en la zona del plan 3000 en casa propia. Tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solo  uno esta a su cargo ya que los demás son independientes. Ella sigue con la actividad de venta de comida por las noches y por el día vende asaditos, panza y refrescos. cuenta que le fue muy bien con el credito y en esta ocacion lo solicita para la compra de insumos como arroz y fideo para la elaboracion de sus comidas, se siente feliz ya que su negocio crecio incremento su clientela y por este motivo mejoraron sus ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Aidé lives in the area of Plan 3000 in her own home. She has four children only one of whom is under her care as the others are independent. 

She continues working selling food during the evenings and by day, selling grilled food, tripe and soft drinks. The loan was helpful and on this occasion the request is in order to buy supplies such as rice and noodles in order to prepare her food. 

She feels happy that her business and clientele have grown and this is the reason her income has improved.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as noodles and rice at wholesale in order to prepare her dishes that she sells

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Emprendedurísmo, constancia y energía positiva son los valores que siempre tiene en mente esta mujer que es ejemplo para su familia. Vive con su grupo familiar, honesta, sincera y siempre con la visión de darle lo mejor a sus hijos de la mano con su compañero de vida. Actualmente y desde hace un tiempo posee un pequeño comedor, que a su vez es tienda para quienes la conocen es muy amable y siempre teniendo los mejores productos. Ella sabe que si sigue así jamás sus hijos tendrán que padecer de carencias económicas ya que ella se esmera por darles lo mejor. Aunque últimamente necesita comprar mas productos es decir materia prima para seguir con su comedor es por eso que se acercó a las oficinas de INTEGRAL para comprar materia prima para su comedor y surtir también la tienda con huevos, leche, pan, pollo, verduras entre otros, cuenta con un excelente record y sus ventas nunca han decaído gracias a Dios, espera recibir la ayuda solicitada y a su vez confía en saldar la deuda antes del tiempo acordado.
texts.en: Entrepreneurship, perserverance, and positive energy are values that this woman always has in mind.  She is a role model for her family, with whom she lives.  She is honest, sincere, and always has the vision of giving her children the best along with her husband.  She has owned a small food stall for some time, and it is also a store.  Those who know her say she is very friendly and always has the best products.  She knows that if she continues with her business, her children wil never have to suffer economic hardships.  This is why she strives to give them the best.  She needs to buy more supplies to continue with her business, and this is shy she approached the Integral offices so she can stock her store with eggs, milk, bread, chicken, vegetables, etc.  She has an excellent record, and her sales have never declined, thanks to God.  She hopes to receive the requested help and at the same time is confident that she will pay back the debt in the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food stall and to stock her store with eggs, milk, bread, chicken, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is 41 years old and a widowed mother with five children. She lives with her children in Samburu. To help pay for the household expenses, Umazi sells brooms at retail. She is a devoted woman who does not believe in failure. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. 

She is requesting a loan to open a vegetable stall. With the loan, she will buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, kale, etc. Her dream is to open a retail shop some time.

loans.use: buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, kale, etc.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 44 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have five children between the ages of 3 and 25 years old; all of them live at home and attend school. 

For the past 24 years she has been selling fish, frozen chicken, palm oil, and charcoal in the local market. She gets a lot of profit and has more customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish, frozen chicken, palm oil, and charcoal for her business. In the future she hopes to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more fish, frozen chicken, palm oil and charcoal for her business

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en: Leonora is a 59-year-old married woman from Cortes, Bohol. She has four children. She has been in the charcoal business for fifteen years. She plans to use the loan to buy more wood and coconut shells to produce more charcoal. Her husband is a laborer who helps her cover their daily needs. In the future, Leonora wants to  expand her business to support her family.

loans.use: to buy wood and coconut shells to make charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase perfumes, shoes, shirts, pants, hair clips, hair ties, and other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase flour, yeast, sugar, and other baking supplies

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en: Kebbeh is 35 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has two children between the ages of 5 and 11, both of whom attend school. For the past 13 years, she has been operating a small cook shop (restaurant) where she sells soft drinks and delicious Liberian food. Sometimes she has fewer customers, but most of the time she makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks, rice, oil, pepper and other items to expand her business. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, rice, oil, pepper and other items to expand her business

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa 48, lives with her husband and five sons at West Point. Her sons are between the ages of 12 and 28. Four of the boys are  in college and  independent. The smaller one stays with her at home and is in school. 

Hawa  has been selling peppers, onions, rice, tomatoes, salt, Vita, and black pepper for the past fifteen years. She learned to sell from  her aunty. She is proud of her business because with the profit she can buy more goods and improve her living conditions. 

Hawa is requesting this loan to purchase more peppers, onions, rice, salt, and Vita to increase her sales.  Her plans is to become an international  businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase more peppers, onions, rice, salt, and Vita to increase her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona desea superarse y encontrar el camino para alcanzar el éxito, esta joven de veintidós años de edad quiere buscar ese camino y ha comenzado con el pie derecho en un pequeño negocio donde vende flores artificiales de diferentes estilos y tamaños, ya tiene algún tiempo con la venta y es muy rentable le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy decidida a cumplir sus objetivos y salir de la delincuencia a pesar de la difícil situación de incidencia delictiva que hay en la zona donde vive, esta muy contenta con el negocio y quiere acrecentarlo pero no posee con el suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un credito que le permita comprar materia prima para adornos florales, flores, alambres, pegamento, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dara a su grupo familiar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Everyone has the desire to better themselves and find the road to success. This young, 22-year-old woman wishes to find this road and has already started on the right foot with a small business where she sells artificial flowers in different styles and sizes. She has already spent some time in this business and it is very profitable which brings her good earnings. She has a lot of customers who prefer to buy from her because of her quality, good prices, and excellent customer service. She is an enterprising woman, dedicated to her work and determined to achieve her goals of leaving crime behind, despite the high crime rate in the area where she lives. She is very content with her business and wishes to expand it but doesn't possess the capital to do so. For this reason she is asking Integral for a loan which will allow her to buy raw materials to decorate flowers, flowers, wire, glue, etc. She has good payment references and is very responsible. She is sure that she will be able to pay back her debt and at the same time has confidence that it will give her and her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flowers, wire, and glue

loans.name: Badeya Group

texts.fr:
Les sept membres du groupe BADEYA sont essentiellement des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 38  ans et en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles polygamiques à Mancourani I un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso. 
Elles sont à leur treizième prêt avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. Les prêts antérieures se sont bien dénoués.
NANA  2ème  debout à droite sur la photo fait le commerce de Bazin teintés dans ce groupe de femmes BADEYA, sa renommée en la matière fait d’elle une vendeuse très sollicitée. 
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt  des pièces de pagnes bazin (riches et moins riches) qu’elle fait teinter suivent le gout de ses clients. Elle les revend au comptant et à crédit à sa clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako et souvent au grand marché de Sikasso ville.
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 57.500 FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne .
Elle ambitionne d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
The majority of the seven members of the BADEYA group are married women who are, on average, 38 years old, and have three children each.  Most of them live in polygamous families in Mancourani I, one of the working-class neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso.

This is their thirteenth loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso.  They are taking this loan in order to satisfy the needs of their customers.  Their previous loans were successfully completed.

Among the members of the BADEYA women's group, Nana sells dyed damask pagnes (traditional West-African fabrics).  In the photo, she is in the standing row, second from the right.  She is a popular seller and her products are in high demand.

With her loan, she is planning to buy some sets of damask pagnes ("riche" grade and other).  She will then have them dyed according to the taste of her customers.  She resells her merchandise for cash or on credit to customers of both genders.  She buys her goods in Bamako and often at the Grand Market of the city of Sikasso.

She is expecting average monthly profits to reach 57,500 CFA francs, part of which will be used to pay off her loan and interest, while the rest will be put into savings.

Her ambition is to increase her turnover in order to better satisfy the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy damask fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: joven de veinticinco años de edad, esta empezando un negocio de venta de artículos por catálogo como cremas, cosméticos, perfumes entre otros, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y evitar la vida de delincuencia, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y su grupo familiar esta dispuesto a darle su apoyo, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante, ha adquirido experiencia en las ventas y eso le permite obtener buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas le prefieren por la calidad, los precios accesibles y el excelente servicio; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio y en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes y cosméticos. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: This young woman is 25 years old and is starting a business selling articles from a catalogue like creams, cosmetics, and perfumes, among other things. She wants to have a new start and avoid a life of crime. It's one of the best decisions she has made, and her family is ready to give her their support. She sells from her home and on the street. She has gained sales experience and this allows her to earn a good income. She has gotten a lot of customers because people like her for the quality of the products, the affordable prices, and the excellent service. She is an active, enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and has a lot of goals that she would like to achieve. She is working hard to gain a more prosperous future. She is very happy with the business. In the past few weeks, demand has risen, which is why she wants to make a new investment. This is why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy cremes, perfumes, and cosmetics. She has good payment references and she is responsible. She promises to pay off the loan and she is hopeful that it will bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: cremas, perfumes y cosméticos

loans.name: Sieh

texts.en: Sieh, 30, is married with three children between the ages of 9 and 15 years old. All three are in school. She has been selling hinges, door locks, nails and paintbrushes on the open square of the market for the past 10 years. One of the difficulties she faces is low sales during the rainy season. She started this business with the small amount of 4,000 LD (Liberia Dollars) that she received from her husband. With the profit generated from the business, she buys more goods to improve the business. She is requesting this loan to purchase nails, paintbrushes, hinges and door locks for the business. Her plan for the future is to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to purchase nails, paint brushes, hinges, and door locks

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta joven de veintiocho años de edad tiene toda la disposición de salir adelante, se ha planteado muy buenos propósitos y uno de ellos es alejarse de la violencia social de que es victima la zona en la que reside, para ello ha buscado muy buenas alternativas como dedicarse a la venta de artículos de limpieza como jabones, desinfectante, cloro, entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante y tiene experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y muy decidida, quiere un futuro mas prospero y todos los días se esfuerza por ganárselo, esta muy feliz y cómoda con su negocio y en estas ultimas semanas que aumento la demanda se decidió para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un credito que le permita comprar jabones, desinfectante, cloro, suavizante, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dara a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: This young woman is 28 years old and has the will to move forward. She has set many good goals, and one of them is to distance herself from the social violence that her area is the victim of. To this end, she has looked for good alternatives, like selling cleaning supplies such as soaps, disinfectants, and bleach, among others. She works selling in the street and she has experience in sales which allows her to earn a good income. She has gained a lot of customers because people prefer her for the quality of her products, the good prices, and above all the excellent service. She is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. She is determined and wants a more prosperous future. Every day she works to gain it. She is very happy and comfortable with her business. These last few weeks, the demand has gone up. So she decided to make a new investment but she doesn't have enough capital. This is why she is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy soaps, disinfectant, bleach, fabric softener, etc. She is responsible and has good payment references. She is sure that she will be able to pay off the loan and she says that it will give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy soaps, disinfectant, bleach, and fabric softener.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona piensa que es bueno superarse y encontrar un camino que lo lleve al éxito, esta joven esta buscando la mejor opción que le permita encontrar un futuro mas prospero alejada de la delincuencia y pobreza, opto por comenzar con un nuevo negocio que le ayuda con los gastos de su hogar, aplicando sus mejores habilidades. Se dedica a la venta de tortillas pues es muy rentable y tiene experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los precios accesibles y por el servicio mas rápido; es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y muy luchadora, día a día se esfuerza en el trabajo porque sabe que así obtendrá lo que tanto desea, esta muy contenta y tranquila con su negocio y en estas últimas semanas que aumento la demanda, confirmo la necesidad de realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su grupo familiar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Every person thinks that it is good to better oneself and find a path that leads to success. This young person is seeking the best option that will allow her to find a more prosperous future, removed from crime and poverty. She chose to begin a new business that helps her with household expenses. Using her best skills, she makes and sells tortillas, since it is very profitable and she has experience that allows her to obtain the best earnings. She has acquired many customers who prefer her for the quality, the affordable prices, and the most rapid service. She is a woman who is dedicated to her work, entrepreneurial, and very hard-working. Day after day, she applies herself to her work, because she knows that this way she will obtain what she wants so much. She is very happy and serene in her business, and in these recent weeks in which demand increased, she verified the need to make a new investment, but she does not have sufficient capital to back her up, and so she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn wholesale. She has good payment references and is very responsible. She promises to pay off her debt, and at the same time she is confident that she will give her family group a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy work tools.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona positiva siente el deseo de superación, aspira a lograr el éxito, superar la pobreza y esta mujer esta buscando todo ello en su camino al futuro, ha comenzado con el pie derecho porque posee una tortillería y una pequeña tienda que son muy rentables y gracias a su experiencia en las ventas obtiene muchas ganancias, comercia desde su vivienda y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y por el excelente servicio; ; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y muy decidida, quiere un futuro mas prospero y todos los días se esfuerza por ganárselo, esta muy feliz y cómoda con su negocio y en estas últimas semanas que aumento la demanda, decidió realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, golosinas, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Every positive person feels the desire to do her best, aspire to be successful, and surpass poverty; and this woman is looking for all of this on her road to the future.  She has begun with the right foot forward because she has a tortilla stand and small store which are profitbable.  And thanks to her sales experience she has high earnings.  Her business is set up at home and she has attracted many customers who prefer her because of quality and low prices, as well as her excellent service.

She is an enterprising woman, dedicated to her work, struggling to get ahead and very determined.  She wants a more prosperous future and every day she works hard toward that end.  She is happy and comfortable with her business; and in the last few weeks since demand has increased. she decided to make a new investment.  But not having enough capital to do so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale maize, firewood, sweets, etc.  She has a good credit record and is very responsible, claiming she will pay back the loan.  She is hopeful she can also give her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy wholesale maize, firewood and sweets.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona piensa que es bueno superarse y encontrar un camino que lo lleve al éxito, y esta mujer esta buscando la mejor opción que le permita encontrar un futuro mas prospero alejado de la delincuencia, y explotando al máximo sus capacidades en la confección, opto por comenzar con un nuevo negocio que le ayuda con los gastos de su hogar, se dedica a la elaboración de ropa en su taller de costura, pues es muy rentable y tiene experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los precios accesibles y por el servicio excelente ya que siempre trabaja al gusto del cliente; es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y muy luchadora, día a día se esfuerza en el trabajo porque sabe que así obtendrá lo que tanto desea, esta muy contenta y tranquila con su negocio y en estas últimas semanas que aumento la demanda, se decidió a realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, aguja, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Everyone believes it is good to get ahead and find the way to success.  This woman is looking for the best option toward a better, more prosperous future, far from delinquency, in order to exploit her sewing skills to the fullest.  She opted for starting a new business to help cover household expenses, and so now is a seamstress with her own sewing shop.  It is very profitable and her experience has allowed her to earn more income.  She has many customers who prefer her quality and low prices, as well as the excellent service she provides making the customer happy.

She is a hard-working entrepreneur who struggles daily in her work because she knows that is how to get what she wants.  She is happy and comfortable in her business, and over the last few weeks there has been an increase in demand.  Therefore, she has decided to make a new investment but does not have sufficient capital to do so.  She is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale fabric, thread, needles, etc.  She has a good credit record and is very responsible.  She is committed to paying back the loan and hopes to provide her family with a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona piensa que es bueno superarse y salir adelante en algún momento de la vida, por eso esta mujer de cincuenta y uno años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere buscar la mejor alternativa para encontrar un camino que la lleve al éxito, ella posee un molino y es muy visitado por las personas del lugar pues ofrece precios accesibles y un servicio excelente adicional a esto para complementar los gastos del hogar también vende productos de belleza que son muy solicitados por los clientes; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y muy constante en sus propósitos, esta trabajando duro por ganarse un futuro mejor alejado de la delincuencia, se siente tranquila con su negocio y quiere mantenerlo en buen estado para no decepcionar a los clientes y para ello necesita de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita darle mantenimiento al molino. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Everyone wants to get ahead at some point in their life, and that is why this 50-year-old woman, who lives with family in her own house, wants to find an alternative way toward success.  She has a mill and attends to many local people because she offers low prices and excellent service.  To cover household expenses she also sells beauty products, which are very popular among her customers.  She is an enterprising woman, dedicated to her work, constantly struggling toward her goals.  

She works hard to earn a better future, away from delinquency, and she is comfortable with her business and wants to keep it running smoothly so as not to disappoint her customers.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to pay for maintenance for her mill.  She has a good credit record and is very responsible, claiming to be able to pay back the loan while also giving her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To provide mill maintenance, buying new straps and discs, and sending parts to the lathe.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer de treinta años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda obtener muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad de los productos que comercia, por los precios accesibles y por el excelente servicio, siempre a la orden de los clientes; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos ideales y no ser influenciada por la violencia social de su país, se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire to better herself is one of the most important dreams of a thirty-year-old young woman who lives with her family. She owns a shop, where she sells basic necessities such as bulk grains, milk, and eggs, among others. She has a lot of experience in sales and this helps her to obtain very good profits. She has built up a good customer base as the people prefer her business for the quality of the products that she sells, as well as for the reasonable prices and the excellent service that is always at the customers' disposal. She is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and who struggles every day to achieve a better future with new ideals and not be influenced by the social violence of her country. She is doing her utmost as she is happy with her work and does not want to let her family down. 

In recent months, demand has increased and she wants to take the opportunity to make a new investment. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy bulk grains, candy, instant food products, drinks, etc. She has good references to vouch for her payment history and is very responsible. She promises to pay off the debt and at the same time believes it can bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: bulk grains, candy, instant food products, and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona piensa que es bueno superarse y salir adelante en algún momento de la vida, por eso esta joven mujer de veintitrés años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, ha comenzado un negocio que le ayudara a ganarse un futuro mejor, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, naranjas, entre otros, tiene experiencia en las ventas y eso le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad del producto, por los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora sabe que todo este esfuerzo es una buena forma para alcanzar el éxito y dejar atrás la vida de delincuencia, esta feliz y tranquila con su negocio, en estas ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere realizar una nueva inversión para no decepcionar a la clientela, pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Everyone has the desire to better themslves and move forward at some point in their lives. For this reason, this young, 23-year-old woman, who lives together with her family in their own house, has started a business that will help her to make a better future for herself. She makes a living selling fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, chillies, plantains, oranges and more. She has experience in sales which allows her to make a good profit. She has gained many customers who prefer to buy from her for the quality, good prices, and above all the excellent customer service. She is an active and entrepreneurial woman dedicated to her work. She is a fighter who knows that all this effort is a good way to achieve success and leave behind the life of crime. She is happy and peaceful with her business. In the last few weeks demand has increased and she wanted to make a new investment so she does not disappoint her customers, but she does not have enough capital to do so. For this reason she is asking Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk. She has good payment references from the people she knows. She is responsible and will pay back her debt. At the same time she is confident that this loan will give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk

loans.name: Elizabeth Eladia

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente por diversas razones Elizabeth es madres soltera, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Elizabeth puso estudiar algunos ciclos de la carrera de gastronomía, lamentablemente no pudo culminar sus estudios, pero sueña con poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.

Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Elizabeth puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de tejas y chocotejas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella sale a recorrer las calles en su ciudad en búsqueda de clientes, ella puede atender a un aproximado de30 clientes diariamente y cree que le va bien por su empeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.

Elizabeth se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una pequeña cocina, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder preparar sus dulces y así seguir con su negocio; de esta manera Elizabeth espera seguir trabajando para poder ampliar su negocio y así lograr su sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 32-year-old woman who lives in the city of Ica with her two small sons, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. Unfortunately, Elizabeth is, for various reasons, a single mother. She is a very happy, hard-working and enthusiastic person who dedicates all her efforts towards helping her family to get ahead. Thanks to her efforts, Elizabeth was able to take some courses towards a degree in gastronomy; unfortunately, she was unable to finish her studies, although she dreams of being able to do so. In her spare time she likes to cook and she sometimes cooks a delicious Arroz con Pollo (rice with chicken) to share with her family.

With a lot of determination and dedication, Elizabeth set up a small business where she sells tejas and chocotejas (traditional sweets from Ica). Every day, from the early hours of the morning, she begins her work, going all around the streets of her city in search of customers. She can serve approximately thirty customers each day and thinks her business is going well because of her determination and the kind treatment she shows to others.

Elizabeth is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help given she will be able to purchase a small kitchen, which will be of much use to her for preparing her sweets and which will allow her to continue with her business; in this manner Elizabeth hopes to continue working in order to be able to expand her business and attain her dream of seeing her sons become professionals and fine, upstanding men.

loans.use: to purchase a small kitchen.

loans.name: Susan Pamela

texts.es:
Susan es una jovencita de 19 años. Ella estudia contabilidad en un Instituto Superior, su carrera dura 3 años  y en muy poco tiempo culminara su carrera, por otro lado comparte sus estudios con el trabajo que realiza en un estudio contable, lo cual considera de mucha importancia para poder adquirir experiencia.Una de las actividades que también realiza es la danza y siempre se da un tiempo para practicarla.
Susan quiere convertirse en una buena profesional y ser una contadora reconocida, para lograr ese objetivo buscara especializarse en ese campo; de otro lado con el préstamo solicitado podrá comprar una computadora algo que considera de mucha ayuda para realizar sus labores académicas, la falta de dinero siempre ha sido un obstáculo en sus objetivos por qué no cuenta con el apoyo de su padre, esta agradecida a EDAPROSPO por el crédito que le otorgara y a los inversionistas de KIVA quienes permiten que ella siga estudiando.
texts.en:
Susan is a young lady of 19. She studies accounting at a Higher Education Institute. Her education lasts three years and in very little time she will conclude it. 

On the other hand, she shares her schooling with the work she is doing on an accounting study, which she considers very important since it enables her to acquire experience. One of the the other activities she does is dancing and she always gives herself time to practice it.

Susan wants to become a good professional and be a recognized accountant. In order to achieve this goal she will look to specialize in that field. On the other hand, with the loan requested she can buy a computer, something that she considers very helpful for completing her academic work. A lack of money has always been an obstacle to meeting her goals because she cannot count on the support of her father. 

She is thankful to EDAPROSPO for the loan that they will grant her and to the Kiva investors who allow her to continue studying.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es: La Sra. Mirtha tiene 52 años y tiene 3 hijos ya independientes, la Sra. Mirtha se dedica a la venta de variedad de artículos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio que se encuentra en la misma zona donde vive,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Mirtha va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de productos para surtir su negocio como abarrotes y refrescos  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Mirtha va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener un almacén y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. La Sra. Mirtha es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada con la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Sra. Mirtha is 52 years old and has 3 grown children.  Sra. Mirtha makes her living selling a variety of basic needs products in her neighborhood store.  The store is located in the area where she lives.  This loan is her first with the institution.  Sra. Mirtha is going to use the loan to purchase a variety of products to stock up her store, like groceries and beverages, so she can offer a greater variety of merchandise to her customers.  Her reason for requesting the loan in to continue improving her business.  Sra. Mirtha is going to use the loan to keep purchasing products and thereby improve her income.  Her hope for the business is to open a larger grocery store so she can offer her customers better service.  Sra. Mirtha is a very hardworking person.  She is happy about the opportunity afforded her through the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products to stock up her store, like groceries and beverages.

loans.name: Bahtier

texts.ru: Бахтиер родился в 1974 году. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его жена работает учительницей в средней школе. Она серьезно относится к воспитанию детей. Дети Парвиз, Нурулло и Ислом учатся в школе и университете. Бахтиер работает экономистом, но его доход не позволяет ему оплатить за учебы сына в университете, так как Парвиз в этом году окончил школу и учится в университете Турции. Парвиз очень способный парень. В свободное время читает книги и занимается спортом. Бахтиер запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 долларов США  для оплаты учебы сына в университете. Бахтиер и Парвиз ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bahtier was born in 1974. He is married and has three dependent children. His wife works as a high school teacher. She takes their children’s education very seriously. The children, Parviz, Nurullo, and Islom, all study either in high school or at the university. Bahtier works as an economist, but his income is insufficient to pay for his son’s university studies; this year, Parviz has graduated from high school and now studies at a Turkish university. Parviz is very gifted young man. In his spare time he reads books and does sports. Bahtier is requesting a loan in the amount of 6,000 USD to pay for his son’s university studies. Bahtier and Parviz are counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Mishelle

texts.en:
Mishelle is a Peruvian artist specializing in paintings with ecological themes. She would like to invest in the purchase of canvases, oils, and brushes to continue her work.

Mishelle has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is her story:

"I intended to study ecology, but didn't pass the entrance exam. Not one for giving up, I prepared to present the exam again. My parents suggested I also apply to the Fine Arts School, for they recognized my talents. I realized they were right, and that I could reach a compromise – I could paint ecological themes. I believe expression is an exercise, while art is the artist's reflection. I seek to communicate my reality through my work and the beauty of human sentiment through colors. My greatest challenge is to pursue my career while at the same time being a devoted mother to my daughter.

"I want to renew my themes and explore new styles to attract a larger audience. All I can say is thank you very much for your support through this microcredit. It is a great opportunity to grow as an artist."

Use the link below to view Mishelle's paintings on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/artistdetail/index.cfm?faid=4446

loans.use: to buy canvases, oils, and brushes to continue her work

loans.name: Emerson

texts.es: Emerson es un joven de 21 años , soltero y emprendedor. Actualmente ocupa una casa que le fue cedida por sus padres hecha a base de adobe. A temprana edad aprendió el oficio de la construcción instruido por su padre , hoy es un hombre muy solicitado por su responsabilidad y confianza para la albañilería,desempeñada desde hace 5 años. A él le agrada mucho cuando termina su trabajo como debe ser, no obstante su mayor enemigo fue el clima pues en mas de una ocasión la lluvia  terminó por arruinar la obra. Actualmente  la demanda de la construcción ha ido en aumento y requiere contar con mas instrumentos de albañilería que le permitan tener mayor fluidez en su trabajo. En adelante tiene pensado también organizar a varios jóvenes y formar una asociación que le permita trabajar en conjunto consolidando un grupo capaz de desempeñar proyectos de mayor envergadura. Esta es su experiencia número 06, como joven que es, esta dispuesto a cumplir con puntualidad los pagos , pues por su responsabilidad lidera su banco comunal y su gran capacidad de  liderazgo a pesar de su edad. Con los 1,500 soles tiene pensado realizar la compra de instrumentos de albañilería como: niveles profesionales, planchas , plomadas y otros instrumentos mas modernos.
texts.en:
Emerson is a 21 year old single young man, and he is an entrepreneur.  He currently lives in an adobe house that was given to him by his parents.  He learned the construction trade at an early age because his father taught him.  He is now a man who is in much demand because of his sense of responsibility and the confidence in the bricklaying work he has done for five years.

It greatly pleases him when he finishes his work as it should be done.  However, his greatest enemy was the weather.  On more than one occasion the rain ultimately ruined the work.  The current demand for construction has been increasing, and he needs to have more bricklaying tools that will allow him to do his work more smoothly.

Later, he is thinking of also organizing various young people and forming an association that will allow him to work stronger, together in a group capable of doing projects with a greater expanse.

This is his sixth experience.  Being the young man that he is, he is prepared to make the payments punctually.  Because of his responsibility, he takes the lead in his communal bank.  He has a great capacity for leadership in spite of his age.

He plans to use the 1,500 soles to buy bricklaying instruments like professional levels, plates, trowels, plumb lines, and other more modern instruments.

loans.use: to buy bricklaying instruments like professional levels, plates, trowels, plumb lines, and other more modern instruments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To redo the electricity, purchase an air conditioner, colors, a hair color caddy, styling chair, salon materials and cosmetics.

loans.name: Tenneh

texts.en:
Tenneh is 29 years old and a single parent, with two children, ages 5 and 13, both in school. 

For the past four years, she has been selling palm oil in the community market.  She learned to sell from her friend, and she likes to do this type of business.  She makes a profit when she sells because her palm oil always has a good taste and because of the good  interaction that she has with her customers. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for resale. Her plan for the future is to buy land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Constitué de 6 femmes mariées, les membres de groupe Danaya vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans et 2 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, d’encens, de bois, gingembre et de pagnes wax et bazins. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégrés  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 10ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame AMINATA (2 eme debout à gauche sur la photo) est la vendeuse de wax et bazins du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 4 pièces de pagnes wax et 2 pièces de pagnes bazins. 
Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Madame AMINATA compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 47.500 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son mari dans  certaines dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
The Danaya group is composed of six married women, living mainly in traditional families and averaging 33 years of age, with two children. They all live in the city of Sikasso (the third administrative region of Mali) and know each other as neighbors or relatives by blood or marriage.

The group members work as vendors selling incense, firewood, ginger, and traditional colorful fabric: wax and [damask-type] bazins. With the goal of increasing their working capital, the group members have joined Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their 10th solidarity cycle.

Mrs. Aminata (the second one standing on the left in the photo) is a group member selling traditional fabrics. She plans to use her loan to buy four sets of wax fabric and two sets of bazins. She busy from wholesalers and sells retail, for cash and on credit, out of her home and at the market, to a customer base composed of both men and women.With this loan, Mrs. Aminata plans to achieve an average monthly revenue of 47,500 West African francs, which will be used to reinvest in her business and help her husband with some family expenses.

loans.use: to buy traditional West African francs (wax and bazins).

loans.name: Grigol

texts.en:
Grigol is from Tskaltubo district. He is 68 years old and lives with his mother, sister and son. Grigol, his mother and sister are pensioners and the son works for a scrap metal broker and gets a monthly salary. The family is involved in agricultural business. In particular, Grigol runs a small dairy farm. He has two milk cows, whose milk is used for cheese products, which are sold at the local open market. In addition, he has a pig and sells piglets locally. In addition, the family grows nuts on family-owned land and has a vineyard. Grigol does all relevant agricultural work to ensure a good harvest. He picks grapes and produces wine, which is sold to wine retailers.

He requested a loan to renovate the house. The existing house is old and damaged. Grigol will purchase building materials and repair it. Then, the living conditions of the family will be improved and they will be able to spend their evenings after a hard working day in a more comfortable environment. Grigol hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to renovate his house

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene de 53 años, actualmente es una mujer independiente y trabajadora, logró con esfuerzo construir una casa de madera, y esto es gracias a la ayuda de su familia y sobrinos que actualmente viven con ella. Es así que ella le dedica mayor tiempo a su pequeña tienda de abarrotes que acoplo en su casa desde hace ya 7 años, y endonde obtiene mayores ganancias. Le alegra mucho atender, porque de esa manera ganó muchas amistades y es muy querida por la gente, aunque a veces tiene que lidiar con algunos clientes que aprovechan su amistad para pedirle las cosas a crédito y tardan en cancelarle las cuentas. Últimamente tiene en mente expandirse de manera que pueda cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, por tanto le convendría vender verduras, carne y pollo, esto solo por el momento debido a que desea cambiar en el futuro la estructura de su negocio para tenerlo bien surtido como ella lo desea. Este es su préstamo numero 18, comprometida como siempre a la responsabilidad y puntualidad agradece desde ya la confianza depositada y felicita la manera como ha ido trabajando MFP, de igual modo agradece a su banco comunal por el respeto que siempre ellos ofrecen entre compañeros. Los 2,000 soles ya los tiene destinado para la compra de mas prodctos al por mayor y el respectivo adelanto a los proveedores que harán posible que ella puede expender los tipos de carne mas preferidos por sus clientes.
texts.en: Irene is 53 years old.  She is an independent and hard working woman.  Through her hard work, and thanks to help from her family and nephews (who currently live with her), she was able to build a wood-framed house.  And so she is able to dedicate most of her time to her small grocery store that she set up in her home seven years ago.  With the store located in home, she maximizes her earnings.  It makes Irene very happy to help her customers because she has made a lot of friends through her store.  Everyone likes her, even though she sometimes has to battle with some customers who take advantage of their friendship to request items on credit and take a long time to settle their accounts.  Lately, Irene has had expanding the store on her mind.  That way she would be able to meet her customers demands.  It would be good for her to sell vegetables, beef and chicken, but only for the time being because in the future she wants to change the structure of her business, to have it well stocked just how she wants it.  The is Irene's eighteenth loan and she is committed, like always, to being responsible and punctual.  She is grateful for the confidence placed in her and happy with the way MFP has worked with her.  Likewise, she is grateful for her communal bank and the mutual respect they offer one another.  Irene plans to use the 2,000 soles (USD $775) to purchase more wholesale products and to make a down payment to the purveyors that will make it possible for her to sell the types of meat her customers prefer.

loans.use: to purchase products for re-sale and to pay her meat purveyors.

loans.name: Isaie

texts.en:
Isaie is 32 years old and is married with two children between the ages of 1 and 3 years. He is known for selling local drinks. He has two years of experience, and he works from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day except Sundays.

Isaie has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy a large quantity of sorghum to make local drinks to sell. With this loan, he will hopefully earn more profits, which in turn will allow him to keep reinvesting for better financial stability. In addition to that, he will continue improving his family lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy sorghum to make drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more coconut leaves and thread for sewing.

loans.name: Emiri

texts.en: Emiri is from the small village of Khoni district. He is 53 years old and lives with his wife, daughter and son. His son works at a metallurgical factory and gets a monthly salary. The family earns their living through an agricultural business. In particular, Emiri has a calf and three milk cows, whose milk is used for cheese production. In addition, they have a greenhouse where different kinds of greens and tomatoes are grown. In addition, Emiri grows maize and nuts on the family-owned land. He sells his agricultural products at the local open market. Emiri is a hard-working person with much experience in his work. Emiri requested a loan to build a greenhouse. He has to purchase the polyethylene cover and perform the wooden construction. When the greenhouse is covered properly, it will maintain the required temperature and the family will harvest more products. It will increase their income from sales. Emiri plans to use the increased income to expand his agricultural business and improve the living conditions of the family. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr. Mario tiene 40 años y tiene un hijito, el se dedica desde hace muchos años al servicio de reciclaje de botellas y envases en el acopio que se encuentran en su misma casa de donde distribuye a las distintas empresas, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Mario  va a usar este préstamo para comprar mercadería para su negocio botellas y envases de plástico y vidrio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar sus ganancias y por ende su capital, El Sr. Mario  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia ya que muchas personas al igual que el se dedican al reciclado de materiales, ella va a utilizar los beneficios compra de mas material para su negocio, su sueña para su negocio es tener un acopio más grande de reciclaje se siente feliz por esta oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es su principal fuente de ingreso para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 40 years old and has a young son. For many years, he has made a living recycling bottles and containers, which he storages in his home and then distributes to the different companies.  This loan is his first one with Emprender (Field Partner), Mario will use this loan to buy bottles, plastic and glass containers. His reason for applying for this loan is to increase his profits and therefore his capital.  

Mario faces challenges in his business; competition is one, since many people like the engaged in the recycling of materials. He will benefit from the purchase of more material. His dream is to have a larger recycling collection centre. He is happy for the opportunity/help giving to him, since this is his main source of income to support his family.

loans.use: to buy bottles, plastic and glass containers.

loans.name: Fabiola Briset

texts.es:
Fabiola es una joven de 18 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Fabiola se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Turismo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Bizteck a lo Pobre para compartir con su familia.

Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Fabiola trabaja brindando atención al público en una pollería de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana asiste a su centro de trabajo para iniciar su labor, ella trabaja un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su amabilidad y cordialidad que brinda a sus clientes.

Fabiola se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una laptop, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder hacer sus trabajos estudiantiles; de esta manera Fabiola espera cursar satisfactoriamente su carrera profesional, con el deseo de convertirse en una buena profesional para salir adelante y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Fabiola is 18 years old.  She lives in Nazca with her parents and siblings.  She is a very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get ahead.  Thanks to her hard work and her parents' support, Fabiola is able to study Tourism.  In her free time, she likes to watch educational programs on TV and sometimes she prepares a delicious "Bizteck a lo Pobre" (a South American dish of steak and fried eggs, potatoes and onions) to share with her family.

Fabiola works, with a lot of determination and dedication, tending to the public in a poultry shop in her city.  Everyday, starting early in the morning, she goes to work and works approximately 8 hours a day.  Fabiola believes that she is doing well because of the friendly and warm manner she has with the customers. 

Fabiola is very grateful for the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have offered, she will be able to purchase a laptop.  The laptop will be a great help to her in her schoolwork.  Fabiola hopes to satisfactorily complete her studies and become a solid professional so she can get ahead and help to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Ernestina, ella pertenece al banco “LUZ DEL SUR” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia es una mujer trabajadora y  madre de 4 hijos, la socia es ama de casa y administra su hogar, Ernestina en esta oportunidad está solicitando el préstamo para pagar los servicios públicos que genera la casa y también invertirá en la educación de uno de sus hijos, pagando la universidad.
Ernestina trabaja mucho y se sacrifica para darles a sus hijos una mejor vida, y lo que es más importante, brindarles una mejor educación.
La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y  una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
This member is Señora Ernestina.  She belongs to the communal bank “Luz Del Sur” (Southerly Light) in the city of Cusco – Perú.  The member is a hard working woman and the mother of four children.  She is a homemaker and runs her house.  At this time, Ernestina is requesting the loan to pay for the utilities generated by her home and also to invest in one of her son's education by paying his university tuition. 
Ernestina works a lot and makes sacrifices in order to give her children a better life and, most importantly, a better education. 
This member is very grateful to KIVA for enabling her to give her family a better quality of life and to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to pay for her utilities and her son's university tuition.

loans.name: Priscilliana

texts.en: Priscilliana is a married woman from Corella, Bohol. She has been in the charcoal business for twenty years. Aside from charcoal sales, she also sells tuba (coconut wine). She plans to use the loan to buy more wood, coco shell, and containers for tuba. According to Priscilliana, "Indeed it is a big help" to get a loan from CEVI. In the future, she would like to expand her business to support her family.

loans.use: to buy wood, coco shell, tuba (coconut wine)

loans.name: Zawadi

texts.en:
Zawadi is a fish monger living in Kilifi, Kenya. She is mother of 10 grown children, three of whom are still in school and need her support. Fish is among the staple foods for residents living around Zawadi. She has been operating the business for 10 years.

Zawadi also runs a “makuti” and “vikoi” shop, selling traditional palm-leaf roofing and one-band dresses preferred by ladies at the coast, respectively.

She joined Milango this year and is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings to purchase additional fish stock. The challenge currently is high competition. The extra income will form part of Zawadi’s future savings. She desires to own a large fish butchery in the area in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional fish stock

loans.name: Issa's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are teachers at a primary school in Koidu, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of SLL 20,400,000 for the entire group. 

With the help of this loan, they will be able to buy or invest in things that their mere salaries cannot let them buy or invest in. For example, some of them will use their share of the loan to invest in business; others will buy house-building materials, or a plot of land or pieces of furniture, or pay school fees for their children. At the end of each month, their school's bursar deducts the total repayment amount and pays SMT/Kiva lenders on their behalf.

Alhaji is the chosen featured leader of this group. He is 41 year old and a native of Small Sefadu, in eastern Sierra Leone. Alhaji is married to a businesswoman, and they have two children who are attending primary and secondary schools. Alhaji has been in the teaching profession for many years now. He has requested this loan to buy house building materials like cement, etc., for the construction of a family dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy building materials like cement, etc., for construction of a family dwelling house

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Pictured here is Ruth, a small-scale businesswoman in the eastern city of Koidu. A native of Kono, Ruth is 27 year old. She is single and has four children – two in primary school and two in secondary. 

Ruth has been a businesswoman for many years now. She sells cosmetics and jewelry, etc. She has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone to apply for a loan of SLL 3,000,000. With the help of this loan, she is going to buy large quantities of cosmetics and jewelries to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of cosmetics and jewelries to add to her business.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy lives in Kilifi, Kenya. She is a married lady, 22 years old, and mother of two children; one of whom is in school. 

Nancy owns a mobile money transfer shop that has been in operation for two years.   Besides this, she also sells mobile phone accessories. Her challenge has been theft, competition, and at times the delay in transmission of transactions.

She was introduced to Milango by her friends, and she is applying for a loan of KES 10,650 to purchase additional stock of phone cases and chargers, etc. 

Nancy’s ambition is to open other outlets.  The additional income from this business will help her buy household assets.

loans.use: To purchase an additional stock of phone cases and chargers, etc.

loans.name: Jorge Ramon

texts.es:
Jorge, es originario de León, de 66 años de edad, dueño de una pulpería desde hace 10 años, negocio el cual comenzó, cuando la empresa para la cual trabajaba cerro y con la liquidación puso la pulpería, solo vendía dulces, pan y huevo con el tiempo ha ido agregando más productos. Además que este negocio le permitió cuidar a su madre, pues es el único que se hizo cargo de ella.
El está requiriendo el crédito para comprar granos básicos, aceite, carne, pollo, crema, verduras, productos de limpieza, snacks, jugos, gaseosas, leche. Pues son parte de los productos más populares y de alto consumo entre su clientela. Una de sus metas es lograr convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora de alimentos.
texts.en:
Jorge is from León. He is 66 years old, and for the past 10 years he has owned a neighborhood store. He started this business when the company he was working for closed, and with his severance pay he set up the store. He only sold sweets, bread and eggs at first, but over time he has gradually added more products. This business has also allowed him to take care of his mother, since he is the only one who takes responsibility for her. 

He needs the loan to buy basic staple foods, oil, meat, chicken, cream, vegetables, cleaning products, snacks, juices, soft drinks, and milk. These are among the most popular products, consumed in large quantities by his customers. One of his goals is to be able to turn his store into a food distribution business.

loans.use: to buy basic staple foods, oil, meat, chicken, cream, vegetables, cleaning products, snacks, juices, soft drinks, and milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase foodstuffs for her grocery stall, e.g., fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Merlie

texts.en:
Merlie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Merlie has been in this business for three years. She earns additional income from her junk shop (selling recycled materials). Merlie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She hopes to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell at her fish stand

loans.name: Mily

texts.en:
Mily is 36 years old and married with five children. With three children in school, Mily works very hard to provide for them. She runs a business buying and selling bamboo in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional bamboo to sell.

Mily has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional bamboo to sell

loans.name: Colette

texts.fr: Agée de 44ans, Colette est mariée et mère de trois enfants dont deux sont scolarisés. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 25 et 17ans. Spécialisée dans la vente de savons depuis quelques années, elle s'approvisionne auprès des grossistes dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. Dans le souci d'augmenter son capital et de satisfaire les besoins de ses clients, Colette a sollicité et a obtenu un concours financier à Finadev en vue d'accroître son revenu supplémentaire et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Colette is 44 years old, married, and the mother of three children, two of whom have been to school.  The oldest is 25 and the youngest is 17.  Specializing in the sale of soaps for several years, she gets her supplies from wholesalers in one of the markets in Bénin as well as outside the country.  In the hopes of increasing her capital and to satisfy the demand of her clients, Colette has requested and gotten a loan through Finadev.  She hopes to grow her supplementary income and contribute to her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy 20 cases of different types of soap.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
As a widow  and parent of one child, Susan works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Susan is borrowing 10,000 PHP (Philippine Peso) through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell for her general store.

Susan has sustained her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell

loans.name: Banco Mujer Epifanía Group

texts.es:
Criselda es la líder de Banco Mujer Epifanía, con 36 años, casada y un hijo de 8 años, está comerciante se ha propuesto prepararse profesionalmente, superar y ayudar a su esposo económicamente y así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. Gracias a su experiencia y a los 2 préstamos que ha recibido de Fundación Mujer, le han permitido consolidar su negocio, y diversificar los productos que ofrece, este nuevo crédito lo va a invertir nuevamente en mercadería preparándose para la temporada navideña. 
Doña Criselda se ha propuesto varias metas a mediano plazo, como concluir sus estudios técnicos y otros cursos que ha recibido, todos con el fin de ser una microempresaria exitosa, y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Junto a ella están 6 socias más que van a invertir en actividades comerciales.
texts.en:
Criselda is the leader of the communal bank "Epifania."  She is 36 years old, married, and has an 8 year-old son.  She is a merchant who is determined to prepare herself professionally, excel, and help her husband financially so that she can provide her son with a better quality of life.  Thanks to her experience and to the 2 loans that she has received from Fundacion Mujer, she has managed to consolidate her business and diversify the products that she offers for sale.  She will invest this new loan in merchandise to prepare her business for the Christmas season.

Criselda has a number of goals for the medium term, such as finishing her technical studies and other classes, all of this with the goal of becoming a successful small-businesswoman and helping her husband with the household expenses.  Along with Criselda, there are 6 other members who are going to invest this loan in their commercial activities.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and household products

loans.name: Mc Nickelson

texts.en:
Mc Nickelson is 25 years old and lives in Katipunan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. He is married with one child. 
Mc Nickelson  has a cellphone repair shop business and earns approximately 10,000 PHP (Philippine Peso) each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan of 49,900 Pesos to purchase cellphone accessories and to fully pay off his motorcycle. 
He has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Mc Nickelson hopes to expand his business to other nearby towns.

loans.use: to purchase cellphone accessories and to fully pay off his motorcycle

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
As the widowed mother of two children, Tita works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal. Tita is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell at her general store.
